For rail transport, we have the following options:
- Train 1015101 (Westbound)
- Train 5117001 (Eastbound)
- Train 2022012 (Westbound)
- Train 5159001 (Eastbound)

Collection point available at:
Calinland Terminal
Door 85, Roll-on/roll-off
35th Street & 2nd Avenue
Oakland, CA 94607

David

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Rebar Shipment Query - Duisburg to Omdurman

email_chain.subject: Container Shipment to Gwangyang - Loading Confirmation

Our container has arrived at Gwangyang, can you take it at 9,700MT? We will load it at Immingham. We will pay you in US$ on arrival at the port of loading. We would like to get the documents in your port office.

Please deliver our mail on the due date, and get the best cargo way for us.

Thanks,
Marianne

email_chain.subject: Re: Container Shipment to Gwangyang - Loading Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Marianne,

We are pleased to receive your recent mail, and we will deliver it to you in Gwangyang as soon as possible. We will discuss the loading procedure of the containers before we start working at the warehouse.

Could you please contact us by phone? We will wait for your call. Our phone number is +82-10-4144-6479.

Please tell me the loading time.

Thank you so much,
Minjung

email_chain.subject: Re: Container Shipment to Gwangyang - Loading Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Marianne,

Thank you so much for sending me your mail. We have made a telephone call to you but we have not received your call so far. We would like to tell you more about our phone number in order for you to reach us by phone. It is +82-10-4144-6479.

Could you please check your message in this number? We really expect to hear from you.

Thank you so much,
Minjung

email_chain.subject: Charter Request - MV Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Palazzani,

We are following up regarding our request to charter your vessel. Please find attached the charter parties and proposed rates for consideration.

Our rates are fixed as presented in the documentation. Kindly provide your final response at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Phoebe

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Request - MV Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Phoebe,

Thank you for your inquiry and interest in our vessels. We have reviewed your charter party carefully and would like to clarify two points:

1. Our company generates charter parties automatically in PDF format. All terms including rates, charter period, and safety protocols are defined within our standard charter format and can be customized prior to signing.

2. Please note that our complete terms and conditions are available on our website (http://www.onlinedonecharter.net) and in PDF format. All crew members must review and agree to these terms before vessel deployment.

Best regards,
Giovanni Palazzani

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Request - MV Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Palazzani,

We have reviewed your charter party and made the necessary amendments as suggested. Please find our proposed amendments attached.

Kindly forward the hard copy of the charter party including our amendments for final review.

Regards,
Phoebe

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Request - MV Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Phoebe,

Before proceeding, please note that we require the following legal documents for all crew members prior to onboarding:
- Valid passport
- Relevant certificates of completion
- Valid ship security clearance
- Medical certificate (Med5)

Additionally, please ensure all crew members have reviewed and agreed to our terms and conditions as available on our website.

Best regards,
Giovanni Palazzani

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Freight Inquiry - Basra to Mumbai
email_chain.body:

We're interested in chartering 8,000MT of bitumen from Basra to Mumbai. What's your freight rate per dwt and your earliest possible laycan?

Edith

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Freight Inquiry - Basra to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Dear Edith,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the bitumen shipment from Basra to Mumbai. Unfortunately, I don't have the rate information immediately available as our trader is currently on leave. However, I can schedule a call with him to get the details for you by the end of this week.

In the meantime, could you please share your preferred sailing dates? This will help us provide you with more accurate information.

Best regards,
Naveen Kumar
Project Manager
Interocean Enterprises

email_chain.subject: Test Email - Attachment Issue

email_chain.subject: Re: SMSF Installation
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

Everything is set up perfectly on our end, so it's time to start configuring your account with the Credit Union. We are glad to hear you made it past the name reservation with the NCUA. The last few things I need to know before we start your application:

1. If you have an EIN # or SSN# attached to your ACCT/MLL/BOS in the CUseler, let me know as soon as possible. It is a great time to have your account number set up as part of your EIN
2. A TIN is needed for 98/99 charter (if applicable).

Regards,
Ben Baker

email_chain.subject: Re: SMSF Installation
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

Following up on my previous email regarding your account configuration. Have you had a chance to gather the EIN/SSN information I requested? We need this to move forward with your application.

Regards,
Ben Baker

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow-up Meeting Request
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Thank you for this morning's meeting and for sharing all that information with me. I've taken detailed notes of our discussion.

I'd like to schedule a follow-up meeting to address any questions and discuss potential additional expenses. We can meet either in person or via Zoom, whichever you prefer.

I'm based in San Francisco. Would next Tuesday work for you? Please let me know your preferred contact method for scheduling.

Best regards,
Kaitlin

Maria

email_chain.subject: Update: Almaty Orders - Feed Grade Urea

email_chain.subject: Fuel Estimate Request - Antwerp to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Belanova,

Could you provide a fuel estimate for 8,000MT of diesel from Antwerp to Santos by next week? Also, do you expect any bunker surcharges?

Many thanks,
Florent

email_chain.subject: Re: Fuel Estimate Request - Antwerp to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Belanova,

Regarding the 8,000MT of diesel shipment, please provide the following information:

1. Available carrier name (excluding Valeriano) and sailing schedule to Santos
2. Next delivery estimate with reconfirmation next week
3. Cargo delivery specifications (max. speed, load line draft)
4. Readiness confirmation for next delivery
5. Any applicable bunker surcharges
6. Expected ETA in Santos and payment terms

Kindly respond with the above information at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Florent

email_chain.subject: Re: Fuel Estimate Request - Antwerp to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Belanova,

Please provide details for the Valeriano's voyage to Santos. I need to arrange payment, so please clarify the details for the next delivery.

Thank you,
Florent

email_chain.subject: Re: Fuel Estimate Request - Antwerp to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Belanova,

Regarding your email of August 3rd, please confirm your expected arrival time at Santos so we can arrange payment (our agents have the fuel purchase order).

Thank you,
Florent

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Additional Fuel Delivery Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Belanova,

I'd like to arrange delivery of 1,600MT of fuel as soon as possible, either this week or next. Please provide complete vessel details including:
- IMO number
- MMSI
- Flag
- ETA Santos
- Sailing schedule
- Next delivery timing

I'm open to alternative arrangements while meeting these requirements.

Thank you,
Florent

email_chain.subject: Cargo Ship Charter Request - Trieste to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Madam,

We need to charter a cargo ship to transport 3,000MT of dairy products from Trieste to Rotterdam. We have a price and terms ready, and we are prepared to negotiate for a shorter laytime.

Please provide your vessel's current TTR (Time to Readiness) and quote for this voyage.

Yours truly,
Danny

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Ship Charter Request - Trieste to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Madam,

Thank you for your quote for the voyage. We need to secure a cargo ship immediately, and your TTR is a critical factor in our decision. We have a customer waiting, and they will be extremely unhappy if we cannot proceed with the charter due to an extended TTR.

Kindly confirm your vessel's current TTR at your earliest convenience.

Yours truly,
Danny

email_chain.subject: NAAF Cargo Inquiry - Daesan to Osaka
email_chain.body:
Hi Jonas,

We require 900MT of non-Alcohol and Fuel Cargo (NAAF) from Daesan to Osaka, and are considering calling on your vessel on the following dates:

- Wednesday, May 23rd. Any chances of delivering by Friday, May 25th?
- Thursday, May 24th. Any chances of delivery by Saturday, May 26th?

Would you please confirm delivery by any of these dates?

Many thanks,
Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: NAAF Cargo Inquiry - Daesan to Osaka
email_chain.body:
Dear Chen,

I apologize for the delay in my response. However, I need some more information to confirm our schedule. Specifically, I need to know the detailed breakdown of products to be shipped to Osaka on either Tuesday, May 29th or Wednesday, May 30th.

We cannot offer a rate without complete cargo details. Please provide a day-by-day schedule of the products being shipped to Osaka. Once we have this information, we can provide you with an accurate rate and transit time. If the products are the same each day, please simply specify the total amount and note that the transit time will be two days.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: NAAF Cargo Inquiry - Daesan to Osaka
email_chain.body:
Hi Jonas,

First, I apologize for the confusion. The shipper will contact you directly to provide the actual details of the cargo.

I will attach our cargo information, and please confirm the arrival date for each cargo. Alternatively, we'll be calling on Daesan with 3 to 5 trailers of the same cargo.

Thanks,
Chen

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Shipment Quote Request - Jubail to Salalah
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

We have a bitumen shipment from Jubail, Saudi Arabia to Salalah, Oman next month. The cargo is shipped with HS Code 27099010, 100T/20ft GP. The package quantity is 37. We are very interested in the ocean freight quote.

Best regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment Quote Request - Jubail to Salalah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Victor,

I am Matthieu, the logistics expert at Al Mada Shipping Company. I received your inquiry and we will be more than happy to assist you.

Please find the following information below:
- The shipment arrives in October this year.
- There is one 20ft standard container for shipment.
- The container will be dry cargo.
- This is a 20' container with GP, no lashings.
- Our price for this service is USD 2500.
- Our bunker adjustment charge for October is USD 75.

We will assist you with the necessary paperwork, such as the bill of lading, loading list, and certificate of origin. We will follow up with you and keep you updated on the status of your shipment.

Best regards,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment Quote Request - Jubail to Salalah
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

Thank you for your prompt response. We accept your quotation and would like to proceed with the shipment.

Best regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Shipment Quote Request - Jubail to Salalah
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

We are thrilled to have you as our client. Your timely response and the professional approach you demonstrated made it a pleasure to work with you. Our team will go above and beyond to provide you with efficient and reliable services throughout the duration of the project.

We appreciate your trust and are committed to delivering results that exceed your expectations. Thank you for choosing Al Mada Shipping Company as your partner.

Best wishes,
Al Mada Shipping Company

email_chain.subject: Price for Rio to Algeciras crude ship
email_chain.body:
Hello Kathy,

Thank you for the lovely fresh coffee I received yesterday. I hope you had a great time on your vacation.

I have a question regarding your pricing for Rio to Algeciras crude shipments. We are shipping 10,000 tons per month from this port, and we need a better price to stay competitive.

Can you provide us with an updated price so we can proceed with the contract?

Thanks,
Tabitha

email_chain.subject: Re: Price for Rio to Algeciras crude ship
email_chain.body:
Tabitha,

Thanks for your email. We have reviewed the prices, and our rates remain unchanged. Due to current freight market conditions, we are unable to offer a lower price at this time.

If these rates don't meet your requirements, you may want to explore other shipping alternatives.

Sincerely,
Maura

email_chain.subject: Equipment Available for Sale
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I recently spoke with Eric at your sales meeting. He mentioned that you might have some equipment available for sale that I could bid on.

I'd like to know the details and your asking price.

Thanks,
Walter

email_chain.subject: Re: Equipment Available for Sale
email_chain.body:
Walter,

I spoke with Eric about your inquiry. We do have some equipment that may interest you.

Specifically, we have a seawater desalination unit, model JETKA150, which is still in good working condition.

Please contact us at 800-322-2687 for more details about the unit.

Sincerely,
Lars Bjerregaard

email_chain.subject: Re: Equipment Available for Sale
email_chain.body:
Dear Lars,

Thank you for your email. I would be interested in proceeding with a contract for the equipment, but I need a better price.

We can offer $15,000 for the unit. If this price point doesn't work for you, we understand and can explore other options.

Thank you,
Walter

email_chain.subject: Documentation Requirements - Funchal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Luis,

It has been brought to my attention that you will be handling the documentation for our client at Funchal next month. I must inform you that we can only guarantee completion of 50% of the documentation requirements, particularly regarding notices of loads and demurrage documentation. We will not be able to accept responsibility for any additional costs that may arise from this situation.

If you would like to discuss this matter further, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Best wishes,
Margarita Madison

email_chain.subject: Re: Documentation Requirements - Funchal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Margarita,

I am concerned to hear that the documentation will not be complete. This situation could cause significant complications on the sailing date and place undue pressure on our client, which is unacceptable.

I must emphasize that all required documentation needs to be issued as previously discussed. This is essential to protect our client's interests.

Please confirm by Wednesday that you will provide all necessary documentation to the best of your ability. If I do not receive your confirmation by end of day Wednesday, I will have no choice but to issue our client's letter of indemnity.

Kind regards,
Luis Perez

email_chain.subject: Re: Documentation Requirements - Funchal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Luis,

I am writing to address additional concerns regarding our cruise client's experience.

The published itinerary indicated a 5-hour lunch break, which was not provided. Instead, the cruise began early morning with only a one-hour stop in the early afternoon. Our client subsequently informed the cruise company that she would not participate in the remaining activities due to international travel commitments the following day.

While I acknowledge that the client's decision to leave for a wardrobe change during dinner time may not have been fully justified, as their representative, I believe some form of compensation should be considered for the significant deviation from the advertised schedule.

Best regards,
Margarita Madison

email_chain.subject: Quote Request - Ammonium Nitrate Shipment Karachi to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We have a 3,000MT of ammonium nitrate product requiring transport from Karachi to Rotterdam. Could you please provide your best loading quote and confirm if you can arrange delivery for Saturday afternoon? Please also send us a copy of relevant documentation for our information.

Best regards,
Olga

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - Ammonium Nitrate Shipment Karachi to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olga,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can confirm our capacity to transport your FCL (full container load) of ammonium nitrate to Rotterdam on 23/11. Please note the weight has been adjusted to 2,300MT based on our calculations.

To proceed, we require the following information:

(A) Loading port and port of destination
(B) FAS Karachi arrival date
(C) Origin country code
(D) Destination country code
(E) Bill of lading number
(F) Required loading date
(G) Required gate in
(H) To be loaded to 20% of the container below deck
(I) Goods description
(J) CIF Rotterdam loading FOB Karachi payment details

Best regards,
Ahmet TUR

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - Ammonium Nitrate Shipment Karachi to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olga,

Following our previous communication, I need to update that the cargo weight has been revised to 2,700MT. All other requirements remain the same as per my previous email.

Best regards,
Ahmet TUR

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - Ammonium Nitrate Shipment Karachi to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olga,

After final verification, the cargo weight has been adjusted to 3,500MT. All other requirements and documentation needs remain unchanged.

Best regards,
Ahmet TUR

email_chain.subject: Chemical Products and UK Market Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wood,

Does your office also handle chemical products such as methyl hexane? And how do you view the performance of UK markets in January this year?

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Products and UK Market Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your inquiry. We would like to inform you that our team currently does not handle chemical products such as methyl hexane. Additionally, we are not in a position to comment on the UK market performance in January.

We apologize for any inconvenience.

Best regards,
Jonah Jones
ABC Company

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Products and UK Market Inquiry

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Charges Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Turner,

I received your email regarding soybean shipment 2607 from Singapore to Hampton Roads, Virginia, with a demurrage charge of $13,500. However, I am actually inquiring about a different order - our 4th order of 3,000MT of automobile gas from Singapore to Kandla, with 45 days laytime, which has a demurrage charge of $3,500. I believe the difference in charges should be lower given the cargo size. Could you please clarify?

Thank you very much,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Charges Discussion
email_chain.body:
Dear Simon,

Thank you for your email. Let me clarify our terminal demurrage structure. The terminal charges are calculated on a per day per TEU basis at the rate of $5.00. Terminal demurrage is calculated based on both the vessel's time alongside/in accessible waters and the number of TEUs still berthed on the vessel.

Could you please confirm if you need clarification on the charges based on the duration in Singapore or the cargo weight (MT)?

Best regards,
J. Turner

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Charges Discussion
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Turner,

Thank you for your response. I have several questions regarding the demurrage calculations:

1. Is there a minimum time frame for the ship's stay in Singapore?
2. What would be the demurrage for 3,000MT of automobile gas?
3. What would be the demurrage for 6,000MT?
4. What would be the demurrage for 15,000MT?
5. What would be the demurrage for 24,000MT?

Best regards,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Charges Discussion
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Turner,

Following up on my previous email, could you please specify the time required to clear the ship in Singapore based on my order weight? Would it be 5, 7, 10, or 15 days?

Thank you,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Demurrage Charges Discussion
email_chain.body:
Dear Simon,

Thank you for your detailed inquiries. While I handled a similar case this morning where the vessel was to be cleared on August 21st with demurrage commencing from August 22nd, your case is different. For your small quantity order (3,000MT), the terminal demurrage should actually fall under the charterer's guarantee as per the charter party, not the seller's responsibility. This is standard for short-term bookings.

Best regards,
J. Turner

email_chain.subject: Cricket Equipment Shipment Query
email_chain.body:

I'm on a journey to Quetta from Brisbane. I have a container full of cricket equipment. Can you please tell me if the cricket equipment requires any special handling during the transit?

Regards,
Saroop

email_chain.subject: Re: Cricket Equipment Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Saroop,

Are you looking for specific handling requirements? I can advise you on the customs clearance process and necessary documentation for the shipment.

Thanks,
Andrea

email_chain.subject: Re: Cricket Equipment Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrea,

I have a container full of cricket equipment, and I need to know if it is necessary to get customs' clearance. Could you please advise on the process?

Thanks,
Saroop

email_chain.subject: Re: Cricket Equipment Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Saroop,

Good to hear from you. I've just received my visa and am preparing for the shipment arrangements. For customs clearance in Quetta, I strongly recommend hiring a local customs agent. They can handle the port pickup and documentation. Would you like me to recommend a reliable agent?

Regards,
Andrea

email_chain.subject: Re: Cricket Equipment Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Hey Andrea,

I've taken your advice and hired a local customs agent. They've informed me that the container needs to be cleared within a few days to avoid any issues. I'll be flying to Quetta in 10 days to handle the pickup. I have a few questions:

1. What's the best way to handle payment for the clearance?
2. Will there be additional trucking fees?
3. I'm concerned about container capacity - will all my cricket equipment fit?

Regards,
Saroop

email_chain.subject: Re: Cricket Equipment Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Saroop,

Regarding your questions:

1. For clearance payments, I recommend using a pre-paid card and keeping all receipts. The agent will handle the fees initially, and you can reimburse them when you arrive in Quetta.

2. For trucking fees and other costs, ask the agent for a detailed quote before proceeding. Make sure to get everything in writing.

3. Regarding container capacity, you should discuss the dimensions with the shipping agent to ensure everything will fit.

Regards,
Andrea

email_chain.subject: ELD Compliance Documentation Request
email_chain.body: This is an email requesting DOT violation records and information of the trucking company to dispute the claim. If you still do not see that there was a violation of the rules regarding electronic logging devices or if you do not want to issue a citation for the failure to maintain records, please make sure that the carrier stops, documents and reports the inspection of the ELD system. The ELD is required.

email_chain.subject: Re: Cotton Supply Inquiry - Port Sudan to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Isabelle,

Thank you for your inquiry. You may contact Mr. Adebayouba Ayodeji in your office or call us directly in Lagos at +234-803-571-0994.

Mutebi Group Plc has been established since 1986 and is renowned for marketing local rice and cotton. Since 2011, we have expanded into cotton marketing, particularly serving reputable local spinning mill clients. We have developed an extensive network of registered cotton farmers in Benue, Kano, Jigawa and other Northern States, managing quality agricultural activities including farming and ginning.

Best regards,
James Mutebi

Best regards,
Isabelle

email_chain.body:
Dear Isabelle,

Best regards,
Michael Adebayo

email_chain.subject: Re: Cotton Supply Inquiry - Port Sudan to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Isabelle,

Thank you for your interest in our cotton farming operations. We have established partnerships with experienced cotton farmers in Benue State and offer long-term partnership opportunities to investors and customers.

Our partners gain access to our farming base and production statistics. Currently, we achieve an average cotton yield of about 900kg/acre, with expectations to reach 1,800kg/acre.

Best regards,
Ayodeji Adebayouba

email_chain.subject: Sugar Delivery to Libreville - December Deadline
email_chain.body:

Jack

Please provide the container numbers and detailed delivery schedule so we can proceed with the arrangements.

John

Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: MS Irene Charter Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Paul,

Kind regards to you and your staff.

We are currently loading IMO 2020 compliant cargo. The charter should commence in approximately 20 days with your vessel. We're loading about 300,000 tons with 1.5% MGO fuel, and FSO will be carried.

We are operating Coast-to-Coast. We will add 500,000 MT of GHT each way.

I have requested the arrival notice, which should be available soon. Please contact me to discuss cargo delivery details to your yard.

Additionally, I would like to establish more formal communication channels. Could you please provide contact details for your charter partner or manager?

Best regards,
Lars Petter Berge

Alex

email_chain.subject: Coal Cargo Import Query - Richards Bay to Maputo

email_chain.subject: RE: Timber Export Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Olá Mr. Neko,

I've been exporting timber to Southern Africa for 6 years now. The trade has been spectacular. While Canadians and Australians previously dominated the market, Brazilian forest products are now experiencing significant growth.

However, we're facing transportation challenges. With the Panama Canal currently affected by weather conditions, do you have any available slots for shipping from Brazil to South Africa?

Best regards,
Cachorro

email_chain.subject: RE: Timber Export Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your message. I mainly handle grain shipments with our partners in Zimbabwe and Rwanda. We haven't experienced issues with grain transport as the Atlantic routes remain open.

However, given the current Panama Canal situation, I would be cautious about commitments for the full route to South Africa at this time.

Best regards,
Neko

email_chain.subject: RE: Fertilizer and Bulk Trade Update
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I should mention that I'm based in Mozambique and have shifted my focus from grain trading to fertilizer and bulk materials. We currently handle significant volumes of dry bulk fertilizer, with around 500,000MT in storage. While we typically ship weekly, our current stock levels are running low.

Regarding your coal inquiry, let me check our berthing schedule.

Best regards,
Neko

email_chain.subject: Import Query - Various Commodities
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Neko,

I'm interested in importing spices, fruits, meat, dry goods, and cashew nuts. Could you provide information about account setup and barge berth availability in your region?

Best regards,
Trader

email_chain.body:

I am conducting research on trade routes and would like to ask some questions about your country's handling of dry goods and soft goods, particularly coal and related commodities.

Best regards,
Research Team

email_chain.body:

email_chain.body:

I am writing to inform you that we are no longer interested in your offer. We are cancelling this inquiry.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Thank You for Your Service & Important Update
email_chain.body:
Mr. Davis,

May we take this opportunity to say thank you for the excellent job you are doing with our shipping operations. Over the past year, we have seen significant improvements to your processes, efficiency, and accuracy, and for this we are very thankful.

As you know, at Global Freight, it is our priority to provide safe, efficient and reliable transportation, and we know you hold the same values.

For this reason, we wanted to be transparent and let you know that we have started working with another carrier for some of our routes. While they are offering lower rates, we value the reliability and trust we've built with your company. If you find that your costs are affecting your competitiveness, we would be happy to discuss this further.

We remain committed to maintaining our business relationship and look forward to continuing our partnership.

Best regards,
Sarah Thompson
Global Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Thank You for Your Service & Important Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Thompson,

Thank you for your candid communication and the kind words about our service quality. We greatly value our partnership with Global Freight Solutions and appreciate your transparency regarding the new carrier relationship.

I would welcome the opportunity to review our current rates and discuss how we can continue to provide you with the best value while maintaining our high service standards.

Could we schedule a meeting next week to discuss this further?

Best regards,
James Davis
Davis Logistics

email_chain.subject: Freight Enquiry - CPO Port Klang to Chennai

email_chain.body:

Route: Guangzhou - Rotterdam
Transit Time: 12 days

Distance: 2,750 nautical miles

email_chain.subject: Supply Chain Services for FREYSSINET Shipments
email_chain.body:

We recently noticed your order for FREYSSINET and I wanted to reach out regarding potential future shipments. Our project teams have extensive experience working with organizations of your scale, and we can guarantee timely delivery of your goods.

Sincerely,
James Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Supply Chain Services for FREYSSINET Shipments
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your detailed response regarding our order. I appreciate that you took the time to review our specific needs and reach out personally.

I should mention that I encountered some challenges while placing the order without a consultant's assistance. I had initially researched FREYSSINET pricing independently, believing I could manage without professional guidance. However, your email has made me consider that there might be additional sourcing options I haven't explored. I'm particularly interested in the potential cost savings we might achieve through either an agent or your direct services.

Your analysis has been quite enlightening.

Best regards,
Gomes

email_chain.subject: Re: Supply Chain Services for FREYSSINET Shipments
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you again for your comprehensive response. The information you provided has been very helpful in understanding our options.

I've done some research and found that your company utilizes consultants in approximately 10% of your orders, which is reassuring as it shows this is a well-established practice. The potential cost savings through either a consultant or agent arrangement seems significant. I would be interested in discussing this further if you're available.

Sincerely,
Gomes

Richard

Richard

Jon

Jon

1. How will we communicate with your ship once we are ready to load the cargo?
2. How do you handle pilot payment?
3. What will be the weekly pilotage rate?
4. Can you confirm your vessel's safety systems?

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry Rotterdam-Algeciras 6,000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Captain Schuppe,

Thank you for providing the pilotage details, safety systems information, checklist, and safety instructions. I have forwarded these to our client.

However, we have an urgent matter to discuss. Our regular pilot is unavailable, and we need to know if you would be available to pilot our vessel on July 1st.

With respect,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry Rotterdam-Algeciras 6,000MT
email_chain.body:
Hello Captain Schuppe,

I must inform you that our port pilot for Rotterdam is confirmed unavailable for June 30th. We are uncertain about the duration of this issue and are currently in our planning phase. We will provide more information once we hear back from the cargo owners and our client.

Please standby for further updates.

Regards,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request - 450MT Vegetable Oil Dublin to Hankook
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon,

This is a quick email to ask if you can take my small shipment of 450MT of vegetable oil from Dublin to Hankook (in Korea) for next Thursday.

Do you have capacity? I was hoping to finalize on Friday, to make my dispatch next Monday.

Can you give me an indicative C&F price?

Please advise.

Thank you,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: ShippyPro Software Feedback
email_chain.body:
Dear Sam,

The software is really nice. I have used it in over 2K deals. It is the best website for finding carriers.

Thanks,
Eddie

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - 450MT Vegetable Oil Dublin to Hankook
email_chain.body: Please note that as a member of ShippyPro we can access the best quotes available for international sea freight.

email_chain.subject: International Transport Services - ITMS Dubai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sam,

I'm writing on behalf of International Transport Management Services (ITMS). We are an Asian broker based out of Dubai, United Arab Emirates with 20 years of experience in the logistics and transport industry. We specialize in handling cargo for international suppliers.

We ship products to Dubai, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman, Kuwait and India. We have extensive experience working with major LCL consolidators and Airfreight forwarders, but also with small and large group of consolidators.

Best regards,
ITMS Team

email_chain.subject: FCL Shipment Quote Request - Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. White,

We have 4,500MT of FCL to ship from Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam. Can you accommodate our partial window 9:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. on 4/28?

Please send me your best rate.

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: FCL Shipment Quote Request - Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alice,

Sure, I can arrange the shipment for you. The current CBM rate is $225/MT. The NVOCC charge will be 1.5% on $2,125 x 4.5 tonnes, coming to $950.85, minus $5 USD for loading and unloading.

I can guarantee same-day movement by Monday.

Kind regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Campaign Funding Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,

We are still waiting for your response regarding the campaign funding proposal for the upcoming elections. Please advise by Monday.

Thanks,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Re: Campaign Funding Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thanks for your email. I am attaching the contact information for the Party Unity Coalition. I will keep you updated on any developments.

Best regards,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Re: Campaign Funding Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,

I've discussed with my manager Inga, and I'm pleased to confirm that our organization will contribute $500,000 to support the campaign. We will ensure this contribution is properly documented for compliance purposes.

Regards,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Re: Campaign Funding Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thank you for your confirmation. To summarize the total arrangement: The Party Unity Coalition will provide $220,000 in total, structured as $50,000 monthly payments over the next 4 months, followed by additional contributions in the subsequent months. This, combined with your organization's $500,000 contribution, will significantly support our campaign operations.

Best regards,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Re: Campaign Funding Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,

Confirming receipt of the funding structure. We will process the initial invoice for the $220,000 commitment from the Party Unity Coalition. Looking forward to our continued collaboration.

Best,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Scrap Metal Shipment Gdansk-Hamburg

Urszula

Kindly confirm your proforma number. We will send a CIF FOB invoice shortly for payment arrangement via LC or bank transfer. Documents will be forwarded upon receipt of funds. Your PO #XXXXXX is registered as the AWB in our system.

Wojtek

email_chain.subject: Dry Fruits Shipment Documentation - Alexandria to Gioia Tauro
email_chain.body:
Dear Mrs. Mawby,

I am writing to inform you that I have received the shipment of dry fruits from Alexandria to Gioia Tauro. Could you please accept the documents and make sure the transaction is properly documented?

Thank you,
Abdul

email_chain.subject: Re: Dry Fruits Shipment Documentation - Alexandria to Gioia Tauro
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Dafesh,

Thank you for your email. I have submitted the invoice attached to you for approval. The invoice shows that 200 kilos of raisins have been shipped from Alexandria to Gioia Tauro. The invoice total amounts to $1,280.

Please confirm if this is correct.

Thank you,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Dry Fruits Shipment Documentation - Alexandria to Gioia Tauro
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Mawby,

Thank you for accepting the documents and acknowledging my previous emails. I apologize for the delay in my responses. My contract with the supplier of dry fruits expired, and I could not replace him immediately. This took several weeks and made me very busy. However, I have decided to continue with the same supplier and have already ordered 200 kilos of raisins.

Please let me know when you have received the invoice and the shipment.

Best regards,
Abdul

email_chain.subject: Re: Dry Fruits Shipment Documentation - Alexandria to Gioia Tauro
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Dafesh,

I have received the shipment of 200 kilos of raisins. The shipment has been delivered and processed. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns regarding the shipment.

Thank you,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Dry Fruits Shipment Documentation - Alexandria to Gioia Tauro
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Mawby,

Thank you for your response. I have received the shipment and will be adding this to my monthly inventory report. I have paid the invoice to the supplier, and it is fully accounted for.

Thank you,
Abdul

email_chain.subject: Biodiesel Shipment Inquiry - Singapore to Yangon
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Xander,

Interested in shipping 7,200MT of biodiesel from Singapore to Yangon. Do you handle bunkers on owners' account, and can you accommodate a 3-day laycan extension?

Thank you,
Elise

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment - Producer T&Cs
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Xander,

As promised, here's the full terms and conditions from the producers. We'll need to discuss with the freight forwarder if this is fine with them, or if we need to update the contract to have them sign as well.

Regards,
Elise

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment - Producer T&Cs
email_chain.body:
Hi Elise,

Thanks for sending over the terms and conditions from the producers. It looks like they're fine with us to go ahead with the contract, and we don't need to update the contract. However, we'll need to wait until next week to discuss with the freight forwarder and let you know what they say.

Regards,
Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment - Delivery Date Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Xander,

I have some updates from the freight forwarder. We would like to discuss with the producer about increasing the delivery date to 28th of June. Additionally, we would like the terms and conditions updated with their freight forwarder to match ours, since they handle the entire cargo from production until shipment. I would be happy to send over a draft for your approval.

Regards,
Elise

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment - Contract Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Elise,

We have agreed to move the delivery date to the 28th of June, and we'll update the terms and conditions accordingly. We'll draft a new contract with the freight forwarder and send it to you for your review.

Regards,
Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment - Final Contract Review
email_chain.body:
Hi Elise,

The updated contract with the freight forwarder is ready. Could you please review the attachment and let me know if it's acceptable?

Regards,
Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment - Contract Signatures
email_chain.body:
Hi Elise,

Here are the signed contracts from the producer and the freight forwarder. I'll send over the signed contracts to the producer as well.

Regards,
Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: Biodiesel Shipment - Delivery Date Change Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Elise,

I have some updates from the producer. They would like to move the delivery date to 21st of June instead of the 28th. Additionally, they would like to increase the payment terms to 30 days instead of 15 days. I would be happy to send over a draft for your approval.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Regards,
Xander

email_chain.subject: Re: RON 87 B5 Inquiry - Gothenburg

email_chain.subject: Car Transport to Copenhagen - Initial Update
email_chain.body:
I have just received this confirmation on the car transporter for you to Copenhagen. It looks like we are unable to transport the car from Rotterdam. The lead time is too short, and the shipper wants it transported next week. I wonder if you could advise on a suitable alternative carrier?

With best regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Car Transport to Copenhagen - Initial Update
email_chain.body:
I would be most grateful if you could let me know of any options for transporting this vehicle from Rotterdam to Copenhagen. I was surprised when I heard it would not be possible to transport it next week.

Regards,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Car Transport to Copenhagen - Initial Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Bill,

I am afraid I cannot help you this time. We have the car in our facility in Rotterdam. We can offer you some storage options and also export the car to Denmark. The export process would take approximately a week. Would you be interested?

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Car Transport to Copenhagen - Transport Arranged
email_chain.body:
Dear Bill,

I would like to inform you that we have picked up the car from Rotterdam and now it is en route to Denmark. It will arrive at the port of Copenhagen at about 11:00 next Tuesday morning. I hope this makes up for the inconvenience caused by not transporting the car on the original date.

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Car Transport to Copenhagen - Delivery Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Bill,

I am very pleased to inform you that your car arrived on Tuesday morning at 11:00. The driver has taken your car to your home and is waiting for you there. I have also sent a notification via text message so that you would know the car was in Copenhagen.

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Polymer Shipment Logistics - Discharge Planning
email_chain.body:
Dear Ziad,

Thanks for the quick response to my initial email.

My deadline is tight, but I can manage a 2-3 day turnaround for this shipment of polymer. I have a crew with five MT handling capacity and crane loading capabilities available. Could you please advise when you can perform your bulk product discharge?

I can also recommend a reliable supplier in Aqaba if needed.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Marvin

email_chain.subject: Re: Polymer Cost Analysis and Facility Layout
email_chain.body:
Dear Ziad,

Thank you for your email. I will share this information with my associates who can help reduce the purchase cost by $5/MT. Could you please provide a detailed cost analysis of the delivered cost? This would greatly assist our internal discussions.

I have attached an image of the facility layout for your review. Please let me know if you need any additional information.

I will be in touch soon.

Regards,
Harvey

email_chain.subject: Rate Request - 6,000MT Acid Anhydride NOLA to KSA
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Kamhi,

We are currently working on a 6,000MT cargo of acid anhydride from New Orleans to Saudi Arabia. Could you please provide a standard rate if we finalize on Tuesday?

Thanks,
Bobby

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 6,000MT Acid Anhydride NOLA to KSA
email_chain.body:
Hi Bobby,

It will cost $25 per MT, FOB New Orleans. The freight rates for the 40' FP container would be about $1,400.

The ocean freight could be spread over 16 weeks from payment. Please note that while spot rates are typically 28% higher than our quoted price, we recommend securing the standard rate by confirming with me on Tuesday.

Let me know if you need any further information.

Best regards,
Ron

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 6,000MT Acid Anhydride NOLA to KSA
email_chain.body:
Hi Ron,

Thanks for your email. I will forward this to the client.

Hope to hear from you later.

Regards,
Bobby

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Re: Kiwi Fruit Cargo Release Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

Just to re-confirm, you should be able to get your cargo release in 30 days time. I'll send you a confirmation of cargo release today.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Release Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

Just to confirm, your cargo release at port was successful and you have received 8000 tonnes of kiwi fruit.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Re: Upcoming Cargo Processing Steps
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

In the subsequent days and months, you should receive further notifications for inspection, export processing and shipping of your consignment. These communications will provide critical information which is crucial to the timely shipment of your kiwi fruit.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Re: Inventory Discrepancy Notice
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

Due to some unknown circumstances, there was an error in the kiwi fruit inventory count at your port. Therefore, we have received an unexpected correspondence from the importer who is in the process of getting your cargo released. We are investigating the root cause of the error which has disrupted the kiwi fruit inventory count.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Arrangements Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Bob,

I've taken up with our Transport department. As you know, the critical part of your kiwi fruit consignment is set to move next week. Our Transport department has already started searching for a suitable air service.

Kind regards,
Dimitri

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Polypropylene Powder Shipment Query - Antwerp to Abu Dhabi
email_chain.body:
Dear Christopher,

Are you able to expedite 1,000MT of polypropylene powder from Antwerp to Abu Dhabi within the next 72 hours? Also, do you have rates for export from Antwerp?

Warm regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Polypropylene Powder Shipment Query - Antwerp to Abu Dhabi
email_chain.body:
Hi Christopher,

We received your initial response which was not specific enough for us to place an order. To further clarify the current status of the product, the specific requirements are as follows:

1. Product: Polypropylene Powder
2. Test Method: ICP-OES
3. Temperature Range: 50C - 100C
4. Vacuum: A vacuum of < 10^–4 Torr is required during analysis
5. Heating: Time and Temp is required for the calcination process

If the above specifications are possible, we would be willing to place an order. Kindly advise your team on this.

Kind regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Polypropylene Powder Shipment Query - Antwerp to Abu Dhabi
email_chain.body:
Dear Eva,

Thank you for your response.

Unfortunately, we do not have available suppliers at present. Our current distribution centers will be able to supply it at a later date.

Best regards,
Christopher

email_chain.subject: Urea Shipment Dubai to Jakarta - Vessel Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good morning Patrick,

We are currently moving 12,500MT of urea from Dubai to Jakarta next month. Could you advise if we will have to take a full vessel to transport this amount?

Best regards,
Penny

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Shipment Dubai to Jakarta - Vessel Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Penny,

It depends on the vessel being used and the type of material being loaded. When moving 12,500MT in a single shipment, several factors need to be considered:

1. Maximum weight capacity of the vessel, which varies by vessel type
2. The physical properties of the urea and its stowage factor
3. The vessel's cargo hold configuration and stack capacity

For this quantity, you might not need a full vessel - we could potentially arrange for a parcel booking on a larger bulk carrier. Would you like me to explore some specific options?

Best regards,
Patrick

email_chain.body:

1. Your PAYE reference number
2. A detailed assessment of your current position
3. A signed employment contract
4. A signed Confidentiality and Non-Competition Agreement

Once we have this information, we can proceed with your application immediately.

Best regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote - Corn Starch Bangkok to Haiphong
email_chain.body:

We hope this information is helpful. If you have any questions or require further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Quote - Corn Starch Bangkok to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. David,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the shipment of bulk corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong.

Our base rate breakdown is as follows:
- Inland delivery in Thailand: $30 USD/mt
- Port-to-port shipping: $77 USD/mt
- Customs clearance and handling: $8 USD/mt
- Total freight rate: $115 USD/mt

This rate is based on 440 MT of bulk corn starch and includes inland delivery in both Thailand and Vietnam.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: RE: Updated Freight Quote - Corn Starch Bangkok to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Please note that due to recent increases in fuel costs and related expenses, we have revised our freight rate to $125 USD/mt, effective immediately. This adjustment is necessary to maintain our service quality while accounting for current market conditions.

We appreciate your understanding in this matter.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: RE: Updated Freight Quote - Corn Starch Bangkok to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Jane,

Thank you for your prompt updates regarding the freight quotes. We understand the rate adjustment to $125 USD/mt given the current market conditions.

We look forward to working with you on this project.

Kind regards,
David

How is your daughter?

Gloria

email_chain.body:
Hi Gloria,

I saw your reply on Friday. We had a conference with the 2nd party the next morning and they agreed to a cheaper rate. However, my boss says no more coal next month. So don't tell him about your new price quote.

Sorry, I forgot to mention that I have a new promotion that would also benefit my daughter. She is still single, but I think she would like a nice bracelet.

Have a nice weekend,
Donald

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal and Salt Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

Really, I could only meet my quota if I charged you the new rate for the coal, so don't worry. Your daughter will love this bracelet; let me know if she needs another one. I just saw a birthday present in a catalog and thought of her.

How is school?

Regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: CFCL Price Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good day,

Could you kindly confirm the latest market price for CFCL grades 54, 55 and 56?

Thank you for your attention,
Liana

email_chain.subject: Re: CFCL Price Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Tanoov,

The latest market price for CFCL 54, 55, and 56 is 40.49/bl., but the prices were updated on 26th Nov.

Kindly be informed that we have stopped importing grade CFCL, and this material is now available only on request.

Please reach me at your convenience for any further assistance.

Thank you for your understanding.

Antal Khilko

email_chain.subject: Re: CFCL Price Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Khilko,

I am so disappointed that CFCL is not available. I was counting on purchasing this material for my project and do not have any other options. I may be able to find an alternative but the ones available are more expensive.

If you have any recommendations regarding these materials or possible sources where CFCL is available, please share the information with me.

Thank you for your attention

email_chain.subject: Re: CFCL Price Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Liana,

Thank you for your message and please accept my apologies for the inconvenience.

Unfortunately, the price for CFCL is not the only reason we decided to stop importing this material. As you know, with the growing production of carbon fiber products, the supply of CFCL has become more limited, and it has become more difficult to secure it.

Also, there are no warehouses in the USA that are licensed to store this product. Therefore, in order to ensure the quality of this material, and not to damage it during transportation, we have stopped importing CFCL.

On the other hand, the price of other types of composites is increasing, and CFCL has become relatively more expensive.

Nevertheless, you are always welcome to reach out to us with your requirements, and we will be more than happy to help you find the best alternative for your project.

Best regards,
Antal Khilko

email_chain.subject: CFCL Specifications and Price List
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Khilko,

I will start my project this Monday and would like to place an order immediately for the quantities I need. Could you please provide an updated price list, as well as the specifications for CFCL 54/55 and 56?

I have a question for you. Where can I get technical data sheets for these materials? As I understand it, CFCL 55 and 56 are available in two variants, with a different thickness. Is it correct?

Thank you for your attention.
Lucie

Clara

email_chain.subject: Clinker Shipment Inquiry - Sohar to Mombasa
email_chain.body:
Can your vessel lift 8,400MT of clinker from Sohar to Mombasa? Also, do you apply a bunker escalation clause or keep a fixed rate?

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Clinker Shipment Inquiry - Sohar to Mombasa
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrew,

Thank you for your inquiry. Regarding the bunker clause, we typically use an escalation clause for bulk cargo contracts. This allows us to adjust rates based on bunker price fluctuations, providing more flexibility than fixed rates. The clause enables regular indexing of contract rates without waiting for contract renewal, while protecting both parties from significant bunker price variations.

Regarding vessel availability and specific rate quotation, could you please provide your intended laycan dates?

Best regards,
Operations Team

Thanks for your enquiry. Our demurrage rate is $3.50 per tonne per day with 3 days laytime allowed. For this cargo size, we require a minimum commitment of 10 tonnes.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Cargo Inquiry - Singapore to Fujairah
email_chain.body:

John

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Cargo Inquiry - Singapore to Fujairah
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your interest. Our complete quote and terms & conditions will be sent in a separate email. We look forward to working with you.

Regards,
Kape Gas

email_chain.subject: Corn Shipment Quote Request - Savannah to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:

Thank you,
Ms. Meggie

email_chain.subject: Re: Corn Shipment Quote Request - Savannah to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Meggie,

Thank you for submitting your request for import and export shipments.

I will review your request and contact you shortly with a quote.

Best regards,
Edith Jones

email_chain.subject: Corn Shipment from Savannah
email_chain.body:
Dear Edith,

I am the Chairman of North Georgia Grocery. We currently have 300,000 pounds of corn in storage and would like to ship 400,000 pounds from Savannah, GA to Philadelphia.

Please provide your best quote for FOB Savannah shipment with delivery to Philadelphia in December 2015. Please include your terms and conditions in your response.

Thank you,
Mr. Mike North

email_chain.subject: Corn Oil Shipment - Dhahran to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hi Anna,

I have just closed a deal for 5,000MT of corn oil from Dhahran to Naples. Is that something you can handle? Also, is there any freight payment system that might suit my client's needs?

Kind Regards,
Terry

email_chain.subject: Re: Corn Oil Shipment - Dhahran to Naples
email_chain.body:
Hello Terry,

Yes, I can prepare an offer for this shipment and provide information about our available freight payment systems. We appreciate you bringing this new business opportunity to us.

I will send you the detailed proposal shortly.

Best regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Mr. Russell's Pallet Order - Delivery Update
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Mr. Russell recently sent me an email confirming his order details. To summarize:

- 20 new pallets for 20,000 units
- Delivery needed in 3 weeks
- Current pallet capacity is tight but manageable

Regarding costs, we're committed to a $2,000 deposit. I'll have the team calculate the final shipping costs for your review.

Please let me know if you need any additional information.

Best regards,
Tami

email_chain.subject: Re: Mr. Russell's Pallet Order - Delivery Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Charlotte,

I've reviewed Mr. Russell's order requirements. Our logistics department can handle this order, but I need clarification on the logistics costs. Will these be additional to our standard land transport rate?

Looking forward to your response.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Mr. Russell's Pallet Order - Delivery Update
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Tami's response is currently pending review with our Logistics Manager. Would you like me to follow up in 10 minutes for their response?

Mr. Russell has requested delivery confirmation for next Tuesday. The first pallet will be ready for delivery this Friday.

Thanks,
Charlotte

email_chain.subject: Re: Mr. Russell's Pallet Order - Delivery Update
email_chain.body:
Charlotte,

No need to follow up - Tami is about to call us to confirm delivery details.

Thanks for the reminder.

Sarah

email_chain.subject: Flour Shipment Quote Request - Japan to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Mrs. Ocampo,

Can you get me your best offer for 2,000MT of flour from Japan to Rotterdam this Saturday?

email_chain.subject: Re: Flour Shipment Quote Request - Japan to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Etienne,

We are the largest producer of flour in the world and export 100,000 tons of flour each year. We are interested in your inquiry.

I note your delivery address as:

Ritger Flour Mills B.V.
Rue de Brabant 88
1000 Bruxelles
Belgium

Our offer is EUR 1,000 per ton CIF.

Please get back to me.

Sincerely,
Harriet

email_chain.subject: Re: Flour Shipment Quote Request - Japan to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Harriet,

Thanks for your offer. However, there seems to be a misunderstanding - our offer is EUR 1,500 per ton CIF, so please let us know if you are interested.

Best,
Etienne

email_chain.subject: Rate Request - Wine Shipment Sydney to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Peter,

We have 6,200MT of wine to ship from Sydney to Shanghai. We'd like your rate for a mid-December cargo.

Rod

email_chain.subject: Re: Customer Feedback
email_chain.body:
Hi Peter,

Here's what our customers have told us they like about working with you:

"When there are no shipments out for 5-10 days, the office is always run by Peter. Peter is a most trusted and professional businessman. You are a real friend of ours."

Thanks a lot,

email_chain.subject: Invoice for Payment
email_chain.body:
Hello Peter,

Please use the attached invoice for your payment.

Thanks and regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Service Feedback
email_chain.body:
Hi Peter,

Great service. Everything is fine.

Thanks again.

email_chain.subject: Shipment HVM-COR200X-00449 Arrival Confirmation
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Arrival
email_chain.body:

Arrived here in Melbourne.

email_chain.subject: Glycerine Shipment Inquiry - Hamburg to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear DTC Shipping,

We plan to ship 8,500MT of glycerine from Hamburg to Qingdao. Please advise the load density, lumpsum rate, and if you have a vessel suited for this cargo type.

Regards,
Sebastian

email_chain.subject: Re: Glycerine Shipment Inquiry - Hamburg to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sebastian,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer direct-to-customer rates for your glycerine shipment scheduled for December 2015. To proceed with the quotation, please provide your forwarder details.

Regards,
DTC Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Glycerine Shipment Inquiry - Hamburg to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sebastian,

Please note that we will not be sending a formal quotation as our DTC rates are currently very competitive, even below our regular global agent rates. To proceed, we require:

1. Your forwarder details
2. Confirmation of the sailing date in December 2015

We recommend booking well in advance to avoid any complications.

Regards,
DTC Shipping

email_chain.subject: Ore Cargo Inquiry - Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Martinez,

I understand you have a cargo of approximately 20,000MT of ores from Chile to Antwerp. Our initial offer is 70,- per ton net. Could you please provide the cargo terms and voyage details?

Best regards,
Tom Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Ore Cargo Inquiry - Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Thank you for your offer of 70,- per ton. To clarify, the cargo is fresh steel scrap, not ore. The cargo terms are FCA for loading and port-to-port for transportation. Cargo size is 20,000MT with proposed shipment date of April 30th, 2019. Would you like to proceed with negotiations?

Best regards,
Maria Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Ore Cargo Inquiry - Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Martinez,

Thank you for the clarification. I confirm our interest in the steel scrap shipment under the specified terms. We would be happy to proceed with negotiations. Please let me know if you need any additional information or have specific requirements for the shipment.

We can discuss details either via email or phone at your convenience.

Best regards,
Tom Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Ore Cargo Inquiry - Chile to Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Thank you for confirming the shipment details for the Chile to Antwerp cargo (FCA, April 30th 2019). Our team is currently reviewing your offer and will respond within the next 48 hours.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Valeriya Kozlova

email_chain.subject: Accounts Payable Reconciliation Meeting
email_chain.body:
Hi Julie,

Please let me know when you will be in San Francisco. I would like to meet with you regarding our current Accounts payables reconciliations issues.

Best regards,
Marko

email_chain.subject: 1099 Discrepancies
email_chain.body:
Hi Julie,

We have recently received the 1099s for all of the vendors we pay on a monthly basis. It seems as though the information reported does not match the information reported on the payables vouchers. Please look into this immediately as we will be required to notify each of our vendors of the discrepancy.

Please advise.

Best Regards,
Annette

email_chain.subject: Re: 1099 Discrepancies
email_chain.body:
Hi Julie,

I have received the email and the 1099s from Marko and Annette. Let me see if I can figure out what is going on. Is it possible that there is some sort of account error?

I will get back to you tomorrow with my findings.

Best Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: 1099 Discrepancies
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrew,

I have been looking over the 1099s and accounts payables vouchers. Although the 1099 information and the accounts payables vouchers do not match, it does appear that the payables vouchers are correct. There seems to be an error in the 1099.

How would the 1099 information get entered wrong? I was unable to find anything to indicate there was a discrepancy. Can you please investigate this further?

Best Regards,
Julie

email_chain.subject: Citrus Cargo Space Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mr. Park,

Today, we'll pick up 5,600MT of citrus from Newport to Singapore. Would you have space available on your vessel?

Thanks,
Phillip

email_chain.subject: Re: Citrus Cargo Space Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mr. Park,

I have more than enough space on the vessel. I can accommodate up to 8,000MT of oranges.

Do you have any other cargoes to discuss?

Thanks,
Phillip

email_chain.subject: Flat Sheets and Metal Cutlery Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mr. Park,

I've secured the flat sheets deal. Could you please include in my tender 3,000MT of metal cutlery?

Thanks,
Mr. Powell

email_chain.subject: Re: Flat Sheets and Metal Cutlery Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Mr. Powell,

Absolutely. We can provide you with 6,000MT of flat sheets. For the tender, you can include your order for 4,000MT of metal cutlery.

Is there any other cargo you'd like to discuss?

Thanks,
Phillip

email_chain.subject: CPO Cargo Inquiry - Port Klang to Surabaya
email_chain.body:
Dear Don,

We're sourcing a 7,400MT cargo of crude palm oil from Port Klang to Surabaya. Do you have a vessel open in the next two weeks, and what's your demurrage policy?

Many thanks,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Cassava Cargo - Penang to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Dear Don,

I have a 22,000MT cargo of cassava to send from Penang to Mumbai. I'll hold the cargo for five days while we negotiate a pricing. Can you offer us a barge?

Many thanks,
Melissa

email_chain.subject: CPO Inquiry - Surabaya to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Dear Don,

We'd like to source 10,000MT of crude palm oil from Surabaya to Mumbai. Can you give us your earliest vessel to begin discussions?

Many thanks,
Beth

email_chain.subject: Cassava Cargo - Mumbai to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Don,

We're looking to charter a 22,000MT cargo of cassava from Mumbai to Singapore. Are you open to this trade and will your vessel be available in three weeks?

Many thanks,
Katie

email_chain.subject: Steel Plates Order Status - Customs Clearance Issue
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Gualtieri,

I'm emailing to check the status of our order for 12,900MT of steel plates from Rotterdam to El País. We're currently experiencing an issue with customs clearance and would like to find out how you're dealing with this in the meantime.

We would appreciate an email back as soon as possible.

Regards,
Greg

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Plates Order Status - Customs Clearance Issue
email_chain.body:
Dear Greg,

Thank you for your email regarding our port clearance issues.

Unfortunately, we haven't been able to clear our shipment through customs due to COVID-19. We understand that this is due to increased security measures put in place by the government.

To ensure we are fully compliant with all necessary regulations, we will have to delay our delivery of your goods. Our records show that we have been in communication regarding this matter but would like to confirm that our progress is on track.

If there is anything further you would like us to do in relation to this order or any other queries you may have, please do not hesitate to get in touch.

Best Regards,
Rob

email_chain.subject: MS Mangrovia ETA Update
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anders,

I have an updated ETA for the MS Mangrovia. I am expecting her on March 4th. I will update you with the port of discharge information once I know.

Yours truly,
Ricardo

email_chain.subject: Re: MS Mangrovia ETA Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Anders,

Yes, I confirm her departure from Nantong will occur on the 4th of March. She is now 3 days ahead of schedule and is operating in the Taiwan Strait. Please find her expected schedule at Shanghai below:

Shanghai
Arrival Date: 03/04/18 10:00:00
Departure Date: 03/04/18 11:00:00
Arrival Time: 10:00 AM
Departure Time: 11:00 AM
Location: Port of Call

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: MS Mangrovia Berthing Details
email_chain.body:
Good morning Anders,

She will be arriving in the late morning/early afternoon, but not in the Anchorage Channel. Instead, we have scheduled her to berth at Shed No. 5 at the Port of Sydney - this is also known as the St. Heliers Wharf.

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Hull Transfer Request
email_chain.body:
G'day Anders,

If you could get your yard to transfer the hull from 05 Shetland to Shed No. 5, we can then get her to push in for final handover. If that's not possible please advise.

Regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Bernard,

Does Vietnam have dry ports? I need to transport approximately 4,000kgs of auto parts from Ho Chi Minh City to Dalat. Could you please advise on the associated charges?

Thank you,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Jack,

Thank you for your inquiry. Yes, we do have dry ports in Vietnam. There is an import office called Sava, located at Hai Phong port. Their service charge is 100 USD per 40' container. However, please note that we have limited experience with Sava as we don't provide specialized customs duty handling services.

Please let me know if you have any other questions.

Sincerely,
Bernard

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Bernard,

Thank you for the information. It seems Sava might not be the best option for us. I noticed some discrepancy in the pricing - the website shows $600 per container, but I've seen references to $1,650. Could you clarify if these amounts are all-inclusive or just Sava's charges?

Thanks,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Bernard,

The charges for your services seem reasonable, but I need a final quotation. Also, could you confirm if the payment terms are 30% before container shipment and the balance upon arrival in Cambodia?

Thank you,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry about Dry Ports in Vietnam
email_chain.body:
Dear Bernard,

Could you please send me the quotation in PDF format? Also, I've been researching and want to confirm if Sava customs clearance is mandatory for shipments from Korea (Dong Ha Port) to Cambodia.

Best regards,
Jack

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request - 10 Containers Americas to Mediterranean
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Mr. Robb,

We are looking for a carrier to move our 10 containers from the Americas to the Mediterranean in May. Could you provide us a quote for a ship?

Thanks.

Kind regards,
Nancy

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request - Sugar São Vicente to Cádiz
email_chain.body:
Hello, Mr. Robb,

Could you provide a freight estimate for 28,000 MT of sugar from São Vicente to Cádiz in early July?

We appreciate any help you can provide us.

Kind regards,
Sue

email_chain.subject: A possible cargo for mid-June
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I would like to inquire about a possible cargo shipment for the mid-June window. This matter requires urgency and needs to be addressed within seven days.

Port of loading and draft specifications:
- Al Khobar: 15-16 meters
- Zeebrugge: 13.2 meters

Cargo details:
- Weight: 6,600MT of LSHS (Low Sulfur Heavy Stock)
- Discharge port: Port of Balikpapan (Balikpapan, Indonesia)
- Expected arrival: Mid-May 2023

Please provide your response at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Mr. Chen
Inland Water Transportation Corporation

email_chain.subject: RE: A possible cargo for mid-June
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I am following up as I haven't received any response to my previous email.

Regards,
Mr. Chen

email_chain.subject: Canceled Suez transit for Balikpapan vessel
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Zee,

In response to your email, I must inform you that the IMO regulations only permit Suez Canal transit within 24 hours after the loading of LSHS. This timeline is too restrictive for our scheduled sailing window to the Indies.

Best regards,
Mr. Chen
Manager, International Trade Department

email_chain.subject: A cargo to the north of Borneo from Bangladesh
email_chain.body:
Mr. Chen,

We are transporting a cargo to the northern part of Borneo from Bangladesh.

Regards,
Mr. Zee
Ministry of Foreign Affairs

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Quote for Soybean Shipment Houston-Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xu,

Thank you for your quote. Your freight rate is too high and we need a 5,000MT shipment of soybeans from Houston to Santos within the next 10 days. Are you able to hold some space for us and offer us the same rate?

Sincerely,
Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Soybean Shipment Houston-Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Yang,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can hold space for your 5,000MT soybean shipment. However, given the current market conditions and tight schedule, we can only offer a slight reduction from our initial quote.

Best regards,
Mr. Xu

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Soybean Shipment Houston-Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xu,

Could you please specify your best offer? We need to make a decision quickly to meet our delivery timeline.

Regards,
Mr. Yang

email_chain.subject: Berth Request - Energy Coal Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Mohammed,

We'll be needing a berth for a 25,000MT cargo of energy coal. Could you fit us in to your schedule?

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Berth Request - Alumina Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hala,

We are expecting to load a 50,000MT cargo of alumina within the next 2 days. The vessel will be leaving on 7th July, 2009.

Kindly put a quick date on the 6th July.

Sincerely,
Sarosh

email_chain.subject: Air Freight Quote Request - Coffee Beans Shanghai to Paris
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mrs. Min,

I would like to inquire about the air freight cost for shipping 400 kg of coffee beans from Shanghai to Paris. We would need this shipment to be delivered next month.

Please provide me with your best rate quote.

Thank you,
Nicole

email_chain.subject: Re: Air Freight Quote Request - Coffee Beans Shanghai to Paris
email_chain.body:
Dear Nicole,

Thank you for your inquiry. For your 400 kg coffee beans shipment from Shanghai to Paris, we can offer a rate of USD 6.00 per kg, bringing the total freight cost to USD 2,400.

This rate includes airport handling at both ends and is valid for next month's shipment.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Mrs. Min

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request - Wheat Shipment Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Taylor,

I'm working on an export of bulk wheat from Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada. Could you provide me with a freight quote, and is that for regular service or LC?

Regards,
Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - Wheat Shipment Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada
email_chain.body:
Hi Lea,

Thanks for your email. I have attached our Mexican market page with all our destinations and fees. The quote for 500 tonnes is as follows: $4,500.00 plus V.A.T.

Regards,
Taylor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - Wheat Shipment Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada
email_chain.body:
Hi Taylor,

Thank you for your quote. Could I have the FOB price for 4000 tons of wheat? Also, can we make a prepaid payment or do you charge an initial payment? What kind of rates do you have for refrigerated service? I would also like to know about the inland charge of $1.50 from port to consumer. Are there any restrictions on grade, or certificates required?

Regards,
Lea

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - Wheat Shipment Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada
email_chain.body:
Hi Lea,

For refrigerated service, we can offer delivery in 12 days. Please send me the grade specifications you need for the purchase, and I can provide you with a sample certificate for the consumer.

Regards,
Taylor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - Wheat Shipment Mina Al Ahmar to Ensenada
email_chain.body:
Hi Taylor,

We will be needing the following grades:
1027--410
2554--320
3044--330

Will the wheat need to be in barge? We will also need to know the origin of the wheat.

Regards,
Lea

email_chain.subject: Files for Printing - Urgent
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

It's Chris here from the back office team. We have received an important message from one of the senior managers. She asks if you would please pass by your manager's office during your lunch break and check if all files are ready to print.

Please let me know when you've completed this task.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Files for Printing - Urgent
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

We just received an email that some files we need are missing in your folder. It was scheduled to be printed today but they aren't ready yet. The manager wants it done as soon as possible.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Files for Printing - Urgent
email_chain.body:
Hey Chris,

My manager hasn't told me to print any files for the day. I'll check when I get back to my office.

Thanks,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Re: Files for Printing - Urgent
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

The manager told me to ask if you've finished printing the files, but it seems you're ignoring our requests. She said if you can't print them, please make sure to label them ready to be printed for tomorrow.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Files for Printing - Urgent
email_chain.body:
Hey Aaron,

I'm the new guy at the office. It seems you forgot to tell me your office number.

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Chemical Cargo Inquiry - Hamburg to Gdansk
email_chain.body:
Sven,

We're interested in 10,000MT of chemicals from Hamburg to Gdansk. Could you send your rate ideas, and is your vessel flexible on partial loading windows?

Sincerely,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Cargo Inquiry - Hamburg to Gdansk
email_chain.body:
Dear Louis,

After reviewing your inquiry with our operations team, we regret to inform that we are unable to accommodate the chemical cargo from Hamburg to Gdansk at this time.

For future reference, please provide details on your preferred loading windows and any special handling requirements. Our previous rate discussions were purely indicative.

Best regards,
Sven

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Cargo Inquiry - Hamburg to Gdansk
email_chain.body:
Sven,

This response is totally unacceptable! You have failed to properly address our inquiry and have shown no willingness to discuss our specific requirements with your office. We have therefore decided to engage an alternative freight forwarder for our chemicals.

Best regards,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Cargo Inquiry - Hamburg to Gdansk
email_chain.body:
Sven,

Our company has reviewed our contractual agreements with your company, and we are very disappointed that this appears to be your standard response approach to inquiries.

Regards,
Louis

email_chain.subject: Crude Oil Shipment Inquiry - West Africa to Guayaquil
email_chain.body:
