Could you do 4,300MT of crude oil from West Africa to Guayaquil? If you could fit it in later this month, please advise.

Regards,
Miloslav

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Shipment Inquiry - West Africa to Guayaquil
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Miloslav,

I've put some space for this cargo in August. The dates have been provisionally set. The earliest date is 20 Aug. Could you fit it?

Regards,
Roper

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Shipment Inquiry - West Africa to Guayaquil
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Roper,

Your proposition is compelling. Could you try to get 1000MT of crude oil from West Africa to Guayaquil? If you could fit it in later this month, please advise.

Best regards,
M. McMillan

email_chain.subject: Rate Request - 1,000MT Mica Ore Murmansk to Asia
email_chain.body:
Good day Madam,

I am inquiring about shipping 1,000MT of mica ore from Murmansk to Japan or China, with a laycan of Aug.15. Kindly reply with your best lumpsum rate including demurrage and reefer rate.

Thanks,
Osvaldo

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 1,000MT Mica Ore Murmansk to Asia
email_chain.body:
Dear Osvaldo,

Please let us know the preferred shipping date and detailed cargo specifications. I am currently analyzing the situation and will contact you next week with rates.

Yours sincerely,
Natalia

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 1,000MT Mica Ore Murmansk to Asia
email_chain.body:
Dear Natalia,

I am just returning from vacation. We would like to ship the 1,000 tons of mica ore around June 25 with arrival by end of July. Please inform us of the shipping cost as soon as possible.

Yours sincerely,
Osvaldo

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 1,000MT Mica Ore Murmansk to Asia
email_chain.body:
Dear Osvaldo,

We have just finished our technical reevaluation. Due to current weather conditions and damages caused by Hurricane Irene, we are experiencing some difficulties. The situation is quite serious, and we are not yet ready to perform sample testing.

We will keep you updated on developments.

Best regards,
Natalia

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 1,000MT Mica Ore Murmansk to Asia
email_chain.body:
Dear Natalia,

We still need to know when your price will be available, and if your rate might be higher than quoted by your competitor. Please also advise if there would be additional documentation requirements. I am expecting your reply by tomorrow.

Best regards,
Osvaldo

email_chain.subject: Sample Request - Pain Relievers and Peanut Butter
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

I'm looking for samples of over the counter pain relievers and BRC certified peanut butter. I need these samples by Feb 20th. Can you get this for me?

email_chain.subject: Re: Sample Request - Pain Relievers and Peanut Butter
email_chain.body:
Dear Angelina,

I've checked with our supplier and they are able to get these samples for you. Can you tell me where you want the samples sent to?

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Sample Request - Pain Relievers and Peanut Butter
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Just send them to my office at 650 Fulton St. Orlando, FL 32801.

Thanks,
Angelina

email_chain.subject: Re: Sample Request - Pain Relievers and Peanut Butter
email_chain.body:
Dear Angelina,

Thanks,
David

labels.commodity: OTC pain relievers, BRC certified peanut butter

email_chain.subject: RE: Sulphuric Acid Shipment Inquiry - Antwerp to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Karina,

Thank you for the sulphuric acid enquiry. As per our past experiences, most vessels from Antwerp take 10-12 days to arrive Houston. Also, most vessels will be full loaded for India with sulphuric acid as a ballast cargo, which will mean lower revenue for the vessel and therefore higher freight costs.

I would recommend using a break-bulk vessel to optimise freight costs, especially given the uncertainty regarding international economic conditions. Please advise on your shipper requirements and if you would like a quotation.

Kind regards,
Jon

email_chain.subject: RE: RE: Sulphuric Acid Shipment Inquiry - Antwerp to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Jon,

Thank you for your response. The distance from India is 8,325 nautical miles. We would appreciate if you could kindly provide a detailed quotation for shipping one (1) unit (21.3 cubic meters) of sulphuric acid at 1.32 MW+ acid based on shipper specifications at a FCA Houston port.

Kind regards,
Karina

email_chain.subject: RE: Sulphuric Acid Shipment Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Karina,

Thanks for your follow up. I have received your updated enquiry and have forwarded it to our contact in India who will provide you with a detailed quotation. The initial freight cost indication is USD 10,500.00 for 1 CTN x 21.3 cubic meters @ 1.32.

Thank you,
Jon

email_chain.subject: Aluminum Shipment Inquiry - Mombasa to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen,

I have a 6,500MT shipment of aluminum from Mombasa to Haiphong. Is it still feasible for us to ship by 19 July? We're worried about tariff risk due to COP26, so please let us know your best offer.

Many thanks,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Aluminum Shipment Inquiry - COP26 Tax Concerns
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen,

I've read through the COP26 tax proposal with interest. As you are aware, the EDC tax rate will increase to 6% in 2023, which means it could reach $70/mt if the rate doesn't rise again in the following years. Therefore, it's important for us to ship this order before COP26 takes effect, as we're planning on increasing our exposure to aluminum.

The current EDC tax rate is 3% and there's an additional 3% tax in 2023 and 4% in 2024. Is there any clarity on what the rate will be in the following years?

Best regards,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Documentation and LCOE Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen,

I've sent the documentation in the email. I've also attached the FMC Declaration for your review. Additionally, we have a product looking to ship in November. Do you think it is worth considering a new LCOE contract on top of the cost for us?

Please let me know if you need anything else.

Many thanks,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice Query - ELT Payment
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen,

We've made our selection and are ready to ship this consignment. However, I've received an invoice from the bank asking for a second payment in advance, as the first payment was insufficient to cover the costs. I believe this is for the ELT payment, which was done in May.

I didn't receive any communication from you about this. I was waiting for an update before making the payment. If it's ELT payment, it shouldn't be this high, should it?

Many thanks for your help,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent - Shipping Company Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Koen,

We're back in touch with you because I've just been informed that the shipping company we've been working with over the past few months has decided to halt their operations in our country. We were notified yesterday about their 'closed loop' operation decision.

Please advise on alternative options.

Best regards,
Adrian

email_chain.subject: Vessel Availability Query - Lime and Vegetable Oil Cargo
email_chain.body:

We need to know your future availability to avoid cargo delays. We want to send a cargo of lime 3 times in a row, and then in two weeks we want to send a cargo of vegetable oil. You have a dry cargo vessel available to move the lime, but the vessel will be available for the vegetable oil after a two week laytime.

Do you have any vessels that can handle the cargo of lime that you can let us know now and then again the day before the date you are available for the vegetable oil?

You can tell us when you are available for the first cargo, as we are also looking for a vessel.

We would be thankful if you could advise us with your present availability.

Thank you,
Luis

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Availability Query - Lime and Vegetable Oil Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi Luis,

I think we are in good agreement. Our availability is as follows:

With the vessel "KT BV", we are available from 12/27/13 for loading lime. We will be available for another load of lime on 1/2/14 and for a load of vegetable oil on 1/15/14. It looks as if we will be available for your vegetable oil at this time.

We can also handle your lime cargo on our vessel "RHV BV" starting on 12/27/13. On 12/29/13, we can also handle a load of vegetable oil.

Sincerely,
Nina

Best regards,
Luis

Luis

email_chain.subject: Anthracite Coal Shipment - West Bengal to Kuching
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

We're looking at 4,100MT of anthracite coal shipment from West Bengal to Kuching. Could you please confirm your demurrage rate and the weekend berth restrictions, and would you anticipate receiving a lumpsum freight quote?

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Re: Anthracite Coal Shipment - West Bengal to Kuching
email_chain.body:
Morning,

Thank you for your email.

The demurrage charges for your requirement would be USD 10 per day subject to the ICD storage fee. We will require a two-week clearance. We can provide you with a lump sum quote for this requirement upon receipt of the details including your FCO, B/L details, and DCS information.

Your samples for coal testing can be shipped along with the main consignment, or you can instruct us to receive the sample at the ICD and do a pickup from the ICD itself. Please note that we are unable to open your samples at the ICD itself. This can be done at the port facility where your shipment is due to be loaded onto the vessel.

Your vessel would have a berth from 26 July – 3 August. Therefore, we will be able to load your shipment between these dates.

Best regards,
Operations Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Anthracite Coal Shipment - West Bengal to Kuching
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your prompt response.

Could you please provide the additional information? Are you able to process the cargo under my terms & conditions? Are you able to send the terms & conditions via email? How can I send you the completed quotation?

Regards,
Jade

email_chain.subject: Re: Anthracite Coal Shipment - West Bengal to Kuching
email_chain.body:
Thanks Jade for your prompt response,

It's my pleasure to provide you the requested information:

The sample testing will be done at the port facility where the cargo is due to be loaded. We will need to have a sample FCO for each item we are receiving. When the cargo is tested, we will only have the test report for each item, we will be unable to know the quantity of each item separately. The invoice for the samples will be generated as a separate invoice from the main cargo invoice.

Regarding terms and conditions, we will send these separately for your review.

Best regards,
Operations Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Steel Cargo Ship Request - Port Kelang to Khor Al Zabbar
email_chain.body:
Dear Prince,

I assume you are referring to the STS discharge of cargo off of the BULKER Berth 7 in Port Kelang, Malaysia.

The most reliable vessel would be the bulker ZEMASHTO. You can find the ZEMASHTO schedule at the following link: http://www.fleeter.com/Schedule/CafCoMarine-DwhThomo.txt

You may contact Mr. E. Sary, the port agent in Port Kelang, at Sary@KelangMarineSDNBHD.com.

Sincerely,
Quan Chu

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Steel Cargo Ship Request - Port Kelang to Khor Al Zabbar
email_chain.body:
Dear Quan Chu,

Thank you for your email. I have discussed this case with Sary, our representative at Port Kelang. He confirms that the ZEMASHTO is currently at berth with an 8-hour window for offloading. This vessel appears to be the most suitable option for the cargo discharge from BULKER Berth 7 in Port Kelang, Malaysia.

Prince

email_chain.subject: Diesel Shipment Inquiry - Venezuela to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello M/s Alex,

I need to schedule a shipment of 3,200MT of diesel from Venezuela to Rotterdam. I have 8 deliveries planned from July 15 to Aug 1. How much is your deposit? Do you prefer payment by wire transfer or cash?

Looking forward to your reply,
Tal

email_chain.subject: Re: Diesel Shipment Inquiry - Venezuela to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Tal,

Thank you for the inquiry. We will be glad to proceed with your request. Our minimum deposit is US$100,000 per shipment. Since you are requesting 8 shipments, the total deposit required would be US$800,000, payable in 8 installments of US$100,000 each.

This deposit will be deducted from the total value of your shipments. For example, if you are shipping 3,200MT of diesel at US$500 per MT, the total cost would be US$1,600,000. The US$800,000 deposit would be deducted from this amount.

The advance payment requirement serves as a guarantee for your shipment and our freight charges.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Diesel Shipment Inquiry - Venezuela to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Tal,

I apologize if there was any misunderstanding regarding the deposit amount. We require a higher deposit than usual due to the short notice and multiple shipments involved. Our forwarders are quite risk-averse and have limited resources, with most of their capital tied up in freight operations. They cannot take chances on shipments without adequate security.

I hope you understand our position.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.body:
Hi!

We'd like to move 6,000MT of liquid sugar to Surabaya, in a 27,000MT Heavy lift/Project cargo Carrier. Do you have availability for load by the 20th, and what is your demurrage structure?

Thank you for your time.

Brian

email_chain.subject: Re: Liquid Sugar Cargo Inquiry - Surabaya
email_chain.body:
Dear Brian,

Thanks for your enquiry. Unfortunately we do not have any availability for cargo for the 20th of June. There is a Bunker Bill due for our vessels, which is expected to be paid by the 13th of June and must be settled for our vessel to load and depart. The earliest we would be available would be on the 25th of June.

Regarding demurrage, our rates start from USD 1.00/ft per day, under the following structure:

Shipowner's Demurrage Policy:
FOB Conditions: USD 1.00 per cubic foot per day, subject to maximum annual rate per cubic foot of USD 75.

Best regards,
Katie

email_chain.subject: Re: Liquid Sugar Cargo Inquiry - Surabaya
email_chain.body:
Sorry Brian,

After a quick review of our schedule, there are no available slots until August.

Thanks and best regards,
Katie

Mr. Goh

email_chain.subject: Re: May Methanol Cargo Pricing

Carl

email_chain.body:

Yes, $300 to $305 per ton FOB CS for 25k MT of DME was our best offer. We're now interested in more of the April 19 shipment as well. Please advise if you can come to $300.

Best,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Re: May Methanol Cargo Pricing
email_chain.body:
Carl,

You're the most responsive, I have to say. I'm sure the guys on my end will adjust to the $300 TEC FOB CS price for the April 19 shipment. I'll get back to you on this later.

Regards,
Dana

Best,
Carl

email_chain.subject: Re: April 19 Methanol Cargo
email_chain.body:
Carl,

That's good news. I'll send you an invoice shortly. We're going to need a booking cost of $35 per unit of MT to hold the cargo in Rotterdam, and of course we'll have to pay for delivery to destination.

Best,
Dana

David

email_chain.subject: Re: Sales Rep Budget Query
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Our sales representative division budget last year was approximately $2,500,000. If you're looking at that scale of investment, I'd be very interested in having a detailed discussion.

Please feel free to contact me directly at john.wilson@tradingcorp.com to discuss further.

Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Sales Rep Budget Query
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

After careful consideration, I'm very impressed with your operation. In fact, I'd like to discuss the possibility of taking a more significant role in your company's management, though I should mention that I wouldn't be able to handle any technical coding requirements.

Regards,
David

Irina

Santiago Hernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Ingots Shipment Inquiry - Caracas to Acapulco
email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Santiago

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Ingots Shipment Inquiry - Caracas to Acapulco
email_chain.body:

Bhaiya Cargo Ltd.

Eric

Gabriel

Maddy

Kind regards,
Sana

email_chain.subject: New Warehouse Announcement in Shenzhen
email_chain.body:
Hi Dr. Tang,

I am pleased to announce that our new warehouse will be located in Shenzhen, within the customs bonded zone. The facility spans 3 floors with a total floor area of 1,600m². From this location, we will continue to supply high-quality, cost-effective products and competitive logistics services.

I hope you are well and look forward to hosting you for a visit soon.

Yours sincerely,
Arthur

email_chain.subject: Re: Factory Testing Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Tang,

Thank you for your previous email. I'm pleased to inform you that we are on schedule with the new factory setup. We plan to begin testing next week and will produce a minimum of 4 samples, with one designated for testing purposes.

Once all quality tests are passed, we will proceed with full-scale manufacturing. We will send the samples to your laboratory for testing. Should any issues arise with the samples, we will adjust our manufacturing process accordingly.

Sincerely,
Production Manager

email_chain.subject: Fuel Pump Upgrade Notice
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We are writing to inform you that we will be upgrading the fuel pump for your car to a more reliable model. This will be performed at 45,000 miles. Unfortunately, this is an inconvenience, as we have already offered to extend the warranty on the car to cover the RLC pump, and now we have to do an unscheduled service.

The service will be performed on Saturday 1/1, and you can bring your car in anytime during the day. We apologize for the inconvenience, but we hope that we are making the right decision for you.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: LPG Shipment Delay
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ju Li,

We are sorry to inform you that your LPG shipment did not arrive at the dealership. However, we are still working on resolving this issue and will notify you of a new delivery date as soon as possible.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Logan

email_chain.subject: Re: Fuel Pump Upgrade and LPG Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Logan,

Thank you for your email. I was just wondering how my car is getting upgraded to a more reliable fuel pump, as per the email you sent on Friday. I have not yet heard from you regarding the LPG shipment. Would you be able to respond to these two issues as soon as possible please?

My apologies for taking so long to respond to your email.

Ben

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Query - Almond Meal Algeciras to Marseille

However, this is a general estimate, and please note that final rates will be decided only after we are assigned space.

Best regards,
Jarrett

email_chain.subject: Vessel Booking Inquiry - Multiple Routes
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Petch,

I need to book 3 vessels next month - one for 3,000MT from St. Petersburg to Portovik, one for 2,200MT from Shanghai to San Juan and one for 5,000MT from Busan to Rostock.

Are your rates competitive?

I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Inquiry - Multiple Routes
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. Here are our rates:

- St. Petersburg to Portovik: $60/MT via container ship
- Shanghai to San Juan: $45/MT via bulk carrier (50% vessel availability)
- Busan to Rostock: $40/MT via bulk carrier

We are quoting you a total of $165,000 for all three shipments. This is the lowest rate we can offer.

Kind regards,
Ilya

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Inquiry - Multiple Routes
email_chain.body:
Dear Ilya,

Thank you for your quote. The rates seem reasonable to me.

I look forward to hearing from you regarding the next steps.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Sugar Cane Shipment Inquiry - Jiangyin to Washington
email_chain.body:
Hello Sir,

I would like to inquire about available lead time for transhipping 7,000MT of sugar cane (REF50) from Jiangyin to Rotterdam and subsequently from Rotterdam to Washington.

Could you please advise if you could arrange this under CIF terms and specify your earliest available laycan slot?

Regards,
Mr. Ashok

email_chain.subject: Re: Sugar Cane Shipment Inquiry - Jiangyin to Washington
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ashok,

Thank you for your enquiry regarding the export of 7000 MT sugar cane from Jiangyin, Jiangsu Province, China to Washington, DC port, USA, valued at US $ 300,000.

We can provide a non-binding freight quote for the cargo in FCL mode. Please note that our quoted rate excludes:
- Clearance charges
- Truck-in/out charges
- Loading/unloading charges
- VGM declaration
- Terminal and pilotage fees
- Lockage
- Vessel port call surcharge
- Detention/demurrage

Terminal handling charges will be additional, based on the service type and handling facilities required. This quote includes shipper's and consignee's transport insurance for transit operations.

Best regards,
Freight Operations Team

email_chain.body:

Gail

email_chain.subject: Re: US Maize Shipment - IEN28R - Aberdeen to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

I have spoken to our logistics colleagues and to our internal fleet. Based on your sailings, the expected ETAs are:

Singapore – 26 February/04 March
Rotterdam – 25 March/April

I hope that is acceptable to you.

Regards,
Operations Team

email_chain.subject: Re: US Maize Shipment - IEN28R - Aberdeen to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

We're getting ready to discharge your 3,200MT of US maize from the M/V IEN28R in Rotterdam on 26 Feb./04 Mar. We hope to load it onto the M/V SAC20S on 25 March/April. Please advise of your earliest arrival slots, and we'll get back to you.

Yours truly,
Gail

email_chain.subject: Re: US Maize Shipment - IEN28R - Aberdeen to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

The US maize on board M/V IEN28R is now on the quay in Rotterdam and ready to be transferred to your ship. As discussed on the phone, the port slot is available from 25 March until 06 April. I've passed your request onto our internal team. We'll get back to you with our preferred ship.

Yours truly,
Gail

email_chain.subject: Re: US Maize Shipment - IEN28R - Aberdeen to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

The port slot has been passed to our internal team, and they have identified the M/V SAC25J as the preferred option. The ship will arrive on 26 Mar. with its first and last port slots set as 26 Mar. and 02 Apr. Please confirm your slot to them.

Regards,
Gail

email_chain.subject: Re: Waste Plastic Shipment Ningbo-Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Soymeal Quote Request - NOLA to Shepparton
email_chain.body:
You're very fortunate to be receiving our attention regarding your reply to our previous inquiry. We'd like a quote for 3,200MT of soymeal from New Orleans to Shepparton. What is your lumpsum for this order?

Best wishes,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Soymeal Quote Request - NOLA to Shepparton
email_chain.body:
I've had a closer look at your request and couldn't find anything in your history to do with soymeal that would enable us to come up with a competitive quote. Your history shows a steady 6 months' worth of deliveries – but in the meantime you've done no business with us. Your volumes are in the hundreds of thousands of tonnes per month. For reference, we can only provide quotes on orders of 50,000 tonnes.

So what would it take to make this happen?

Let me know if you've got any ideas.

Regards,
Kirsty

email_chain.subject: Re: Soymeal Quote Request - NOLA to Shepparton
email_chain.body:
Having reflected on it, we can offer you a reduced rate if we guarantee delivery of at least 1,000 tonnes per month, for an extended period. Given that we have a similar monthly requirement of soymeal, this doesn't cause us any significant disruption to our operation.

However, this is dependent on us securing the volumes we need – for which we require a commitment from you. We need to know if we can rely on you to deliver the specified quantity – and if so, when.

We'll send our latest supply schedule to you. Please let us know by return if you're interested in this deal.

Best wishes,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Fresh Garlic Shipment Cairo-Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Xavier,

We have a small shipment of 160MT of fresh garlic from Cairo to Jeddah that will sail on the Sea Navigator on the 26th. The cargo will be shipped in a sea container and will be ready for loading at the discharge port by 26 August. Are you interested in handling this shipment?

Best regards,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Fresh Garlic Shipment Cairo-Jeddah
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Fresh Garlic Shipment Cairo-Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Henry,

We have been back at work and wanted to reconfirm the fresh garlic order. Is this still valid? We are interested in arranging this shipment. Could you please confirm the full weight of the cargo and its packing volume? When are you planning to load the container?

Thanks,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Re: Fresh Garlic Shipment Cairo-Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Tony,

Yes, it is still valid. The full weight of the cargo will be 160MT. The packing volume will be 36CBM. The container will be loaded on 2nd September. How are you going to handle this shipment?

Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Fresh Garlic Shipment Cairo-Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,

I am looking forward to handling this shipment. I am considering sea transport via the Seaway Transit liner. Do you think this would provide a suitable transit time for the shipment?

Best regards,
Tony

email_chain.subject: Lead Shipment Request

email_chain.subject: Rotterdam-NOLA Jet Fuel Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

I'm looking at shipping 11,500MT of ex-Rotterdam jet fuel to New Orleans via the Suez Canal. Could you send me details of your laycan from outload to EDCT to confirm that you can match the JWC?

Many thanks,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Rotterdam-NOLA Jet Fuel Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Simon,

Sorry for the delay in responding. Please find the following confirmations:

1. Onboard time of 10 hours to Suez Canal
2. Vessel ETA to New Orleans: June 17, 2022
3. Vessel: L5
   Master: Captain Henrique Damasceno
   QM: Mercu Regalado

Could you please confirm with the charterer your specific time requirements from dock to EDCT?

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Rotterdam-NOLA Jet Fuel Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

The charterer requires EDCT by 23:59 on June 13, 2022. Is this still feasible with the schedule you offered for June 12?

Many thanks,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Rotterdam-NOLA Jet Fuel Shipment Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Simon,

Regarding the loading schedule:

We can load between 05:00-06:30 on June 13. However, we cannot conduct loading operations between 06:30 and next day. For reference, if we start loading at 05:00 on June 13, we must complete by 06:30, otherwise loading will need to continue at 05:00 on June 14.

This restriction is due to EDCT facility requirements. I will verify the ETA again and confirm.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Kerosene Shipment - Las Palmas Draft Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Thanks for confirming your slot on the kerosene job. I just need to confirm your draft restrictions - are you cleared to touch at Las Palmas? I'll see you on September 12th.

Best,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Kerosene Shipment - Las Palmas Draft Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Eva,

We were wondering if we could push up the entry by a day to Saturday 10th. As you may have noticed, the winds are picking up and are expected to get worse as we get closer to the weekend. We are concerned this might slow us down if we need to tack against onshore winds or, worse, get caught in heavy waves. The job is absolutely essential so I wanted to check with you about this.

Thanks so much,
Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Kerosene Shipment - Las Palmas Draft Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Julie,

Thanks for getting back to me. Unfortunately, I'll be in Hong Kong from 7th to 11th September, so the job will have to be postponed to the 13th. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

My bags will need to be forwarded from Hong Kong to Paris, then to Marseille and finally to Valencia by September 12th.

Best regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Kerosene Shipment - Las Palmas Draft Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Eva,

Thanks for letting me know about the meeting arrangements. We're scheduled to depart on September 15th and arrive on the 19th. We'll be staying at the Grand Hôtel du Grand Port Maritime on the 16th in Valencia. You'll have no trouble finding us there.

Best regards,
Julie

email_chain.subject: Grain Shipment Inquiry - Jeddah to Puntarenas
email_chain.body:

We need to load 2,400MT of grain from Jeddah to Puntarenas. Do you allow direct voyage and could you advise a best arrival date?

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry - Jeddah to Puntarenas
email_chain.body:
Good morning Simon,

We can ship during 21-25 June for a best arrival of 12-16 July. Loading is possible until 4 July. We do allow direct voyages. Please let us know what additional information you need from us.

Thanks,
Efraim

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry - Jeddah to Puntarenas
email_chain.body:
Good morning Simon,

Angel

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Transport Request - Hobart to Halifax

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Request - Rotterdam to Port Sudan

We cannot accept your offer for delivery of 5000 MT of petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. We are not permitted to transship petroleum products through Rotterdam due to government regulations. Therefore, we would prefer to be booked directly to Port Sudan on a FOB basis.

Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Request - Rotterdam to Port Sudan

Thank you for your response regarding our request for 5000 MT of petroleum products from Rotterdam to Port Sudan. I understand that due to shipping regulations, you can only accept direct shipments to Port Sudan on an FOB basis. We will revise our logistics arrangements accordingly.

Regards,
Ann

In the meantime, let's get started on a 70,000MT voyage of Durkulp from San Francisco to Tianjin. I've attached the charter party for you to review.

If you agree with the terms, I can have the charter party signed today.

Best regards,
Maura

email_chain.subject: Re: Durkulp Charter Party - SF to Tianjin

The charter party looks reasonable to me. I would like to proceed with this deal. If you could email me a signed copy ASAP, that would be great.

Best regards,
Mr. Liu

email_chain.subject: Re: Durkulp Charter Party - SF to Tianjin
email_chain.body:

Thanks,
Mr. Liu

email_chain.subject: Re: Durkulp Charter Party - SF to Tianjin
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Liu,

I've reviewed your email and added the terms you requested. Here's the updated charter party. Could you sign it and email it back to me?

Best regards,
Maura

email_chain.subject: Re: Durkulp Charter Party - SF to Tianjin
email_chain.body:
Dear Maura,

Here's the signed copy. Could you email the funds to my company account today?

Mr. Liu

John

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - 90MT Bitumen USA to Houston

John

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - 90MT Bitumen USA to Houston
email_chain.body:

John

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB Port Arthur Rate Request

email_chain.subject: Re: Lumber Shipment Inquiry - Korea to Vancouver

email_chain.body:

Regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Lumber Shipment Inquiry - Korea to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Hi Lida,

I apologize that I won't be able to provide immediate assistance. I'm currently traveling to meet clients in Sweden and will be occupied until April 20th (5:30 PM CET). I'll be happy to discuss this matter in detail after my return.

Best regards,
Toby

email_chain.subject: ETA Update Request - MS Mangrovia from Yangon
email_chain.body:

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Molasses Shipment Quote Request - Batumi to Zeebrugge
email_chain.body:

With kind regards,
Clemens

email_chain.subject: Vessel Inquiry - Coal Shipment Osaka to Kashima
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Santiago,

I require a 12,000MT tanker to carry coals from Osaka to Kashima. Could you please advise on vessel availability for this service?

Please note that we require faster sailing times than our usual requirements, though we can accept lower priority listing.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Availability from Jaxport
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

I understand you have chartered 2000MT+ tankers from Jaxport. Could you advise if any are still available for the mentioned service?

Please also provide details on:
1. Current priority listing availability
2. Next charter availability if current vessels are occupied
3. List of vessels currently being chartered and their specifications
4. Available vessel types (deep sea/shallow draft)

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Vessel Inquiry - Kashima to Kobe
email_chain.body:
Hi,

I am looking for a 2000MT, shallow draft, slow cargo vessel for a Kashima to Kobe route.

Please provide:
1. List of currently available ships and their rates

Regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Ore Shipment Inquiry - Dalbeattie to Plymouth
email_chain.body:
Hello Meg,

I need to ship 3,300MT of crushed ore from Dalbeattie to Plymouth. Do you have any open slots in June and can you confirm your ship's draft restrictions?

Warm regards,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Ore Shipment Inquiry - Dalbeattie to Plymouth
email_chain.body:
Dear Eva,

Sorry for the late reply, I haven't received your initial email. Is there anything urgent with the shipping?

I can check our available slots for June and provide you with our ship's draft restrictions. Please let me know if this works for you.

Thanks,
Meg

email_chain.subject: Re: Ore Shipment Inquiry - Dalbeattie to Plymouth
email_chain.body:
Hi Meg,

The order is very urgent as I need to ship it by 10th of June. However, I will wait for your confirmation.

Thanks,
Eva

email_chain.subject: Re: Ore Shipment Inquiry - Dalbeattie to Plymouth
email_chain.body:
Dear Eva,

I've checked our schedule regarding your request. Unfortunately, we don't have any slots available for a single vessel in June. All our ships have tight schedules, and I cannot guarantee that we'll have any slots open by the end of June.

I've attached our ship's draft restrictions for your reference, but given your urgent timeline of June 10th, I recommend exploring alternative shipping options.

Best regards,
Meg

email_chain.subject: Vessel Inquiry - Coal Shipment Kobe to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Connor,

Do you have a suitable vessel for 4,500MT of coal from Kobe to Jakarta next week? We've already reserved a vessel on Alisports, however I'd like to get some other quotes too.

Thank you,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry - Coal Shipment Kobe to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hi Ryan,

Thank you for your email. We have confirmed an estimate price of around 6,000USD per ton for the shipment. This price may change depending on shipping time. We will make an order in the following week.

The captain and our legal team will provide further information.

Regards,
Captain Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry - Coal Shipment Kobe to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hello Captain Ray,

Could you provide more specific details about the route that I mentioned in my initial email? We need a detailed estimation of the shipping costs from Kobe to Jakarta.

Thank you,
Ryan

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry - Coal Shipment Kobe to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Dear Ryan,

Sorry for the delay. Please let me know if you're available before noon today. We can arrange for our captain to discuss the details with you in person.

Best regards,
Marie

email_chain.subject: Boiler Shipment Delay Query - Fujairah to Liverpool
email_chain.body:

Our customer is on a week-long strike, and we have a shipment of new boilers to ship from Fujairah to Liverpool. Do you charge a repair rate for delays caused by any issues on the orderer's end?

Thanks,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Boiler Shipment Delay Query - Fujairah to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Dear Rory,

Please ensure the order is properly booked in our system first. If it is already booked, we will issue a credit to your account. If not, you'll need to complete the booking process before proceeding with the shipment.

Best regards,
Roy

email_chain.subject: F6 Series Boilers Stock Update
email_chain.body:
This is just a reminder to let you know that we are out of the F6 series boilers. Please let us know if you need another one shipped out in the next week.

Thank you,
Owen

email_chain.subject: Urgent: F6 Series Boiler Availability
email_chain.body:
Our customer is out of stock, do you have any on the F6 series that we can send out today? I can send you a PO right away.

Thank you,
Owen

email_chain.subject: Quote Request - Istanbul to Hamburg Cargo
email_chain.body:
I see from your website that you can handle EXW for my cargo. Can you please provide me a quote for 2,000MT of raw material from Istanbul to Hamburg? Also, if I may ask, could you please attach a photo of your truck?

Cheers,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - Istanbul to Hamburg Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Sam,

Thank you for your message. We need your FOB Istanbul price (or as specified in the Proforma Invoice) to proceed with the quotation. The cargo details I have noted are:
- 2000MT Beans from Erzincan

We can handle all EXW or FOB terms and are happy to assist you. Please provide your FOB Istanbul price so we can prepare a comprehensive quote.

Best regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - Istanbul to Hamburg Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear Sam,

Based on your FOB terms, I am pleased to provide a formal quote of US$1,270.00 per ton FOB Istanbul. Our service includes export, clearing, loading, trucking, insurance and all international documentation.

We require 50% advance payment before delivery. The FOB deadline is March 24th, 2014.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - Istanbul to Hamburg Cargo
email_chain.body:
Mike,

Thank you for the quote. I confirm receipt of the FOB terms for the invoice. Please let me know when the first installment is due.

Best regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Sevan Semi Inquiry - Maize Pellets to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
I've been following your latest ships in the Suez Canal. However, I'm after a Sevan semi to load 15,000MT of maize pellets to Sri Lanka. Do you think we could put together a letter of credit or are there any restrictions to your services?

Thanks,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Sevan Semi Inquiry - Maize Pellets to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Dear Mike,

Following up on your inquiry, I was able to secure a berth for next week with MT Crewing 1st. As soon as I receive confirmation of arrival and Master's timing, I will start the preparation of chartering documents and the COC's.

I'll be in touch shortly.

Best regards,
Operations Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Sevan Semi Inquiry - Maize Pellets to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Dear Mike,

Thanks for the reference cargo. We are still working on your proposed rates and freight agreement. We will be in touch when we have more information for you.

Best regards,
Operations Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Sevan Semi Inquiry - Maize Pellets to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I refer to your request for 15,000MT of PDI maize. Unfortunately, we are unable to assist you with this offer as initially proposed. We have followed up with our 3rd party provider, and while they can meet the quantity, they cannot meet the deadline of 11.09.2008.

Best regards,
Operations Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Sevan Semi Inquiry - Maize Pellets to Sri Lanka
email_chain.body:
Dear Mike,

We're now planning to load your grain on 2 vessels over a two-week period, with a vessel arrival on June 23rd. Please let us know if this alternative arrangement would work for you.

Best regards,
Operations Manager

email_chain.body:

1. Master name and address
2. Vessel name and address
3. ETA
4. Departure port
5. Arrival port

Please reply to this email address so that I can confirm the documents will be ready for collection from the Agent in Rotterdam.

With best regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Shipment Quote Request - Hamburg to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email. We are proceeding.

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Barge Charter Contract - Dammam to Singapore
email_chain.body:

Bob Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Barge Charter Contract - Dammam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

With best regards,
Bob Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Barge Charter Contract - Inspection Invitation
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

We would welcome the opportunity to meet with you before finalizing the order. Please feel free to visit our facility at Quay No: 15, Shankar Nagar, Durban to inspect the barges.

Best regards,
Bob Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Barge Inspection Scheduling
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

We look forward to having you inspect the barges at our location. Please let us know your preferred date for the visit, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Bob Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Barges Ready for Inspection
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

The barges for your order are now ready for inspection at Quay No: 15, Shankar Nagar, Durban. We would greatly appreciate if you could schedule your visit at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Bob Johnson

email_chain.subject: El Bayao Port Schedule Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Luci,

Port conditions on El Bayao have worsened slightly, and we are rescheduling our trip. Our new ETA is Thursday, and we would like to assume a 3-day port freeze.

Y'all have a good day,
Marcus

email_chain.subject: Re: El Bayao Port Schedule Update
email_chain.body:
Marcus,

Please see below.

There is a small storm system moving through the gulf, and it is forecasted to strengthen as it hits our area. Local boats have begun evacuating their crews.

We would recommend reevaluating the trip, and having a delay to the next workweek.

D&L has great options during storm season, and if you are able to make a change, we have a May 5th shift available.

Thanks,
Em

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Quote Request - Newcastle to Texas Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:

Yours sincerely,
Mr. Hong

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Quote Request - Newcastle to Texas Coal Shipment

Good morning,

Below is the list of available vessels:

FALMOUTH - 138 DWT - LUCK LINE - Sep 21 - Oct 13 - Demerara - $89,999

LUCK VESSEL 2 - 144 DWT - LUCK LINE - Sep 26 - Oct 17 - Abidjan - $62,000

HANJIN STAR - 142 DWT - HANJIN - Sep 27 - Oct 27 - Abidjan - $67,000

email_chain.subject: Thanks for your proposal

Your proposal to purchase 5,000MT of corn from the West African coast looks quite attractive. However, as part of our tendering process, we need to get multiple quotes. Can you please provide the same terms, as well as your earliest loading window, and your latest port costs for us to include your bid in our final assessment of offers?

We have 5,400MT of lubricants that need to be shipped from Antwerp to Hamburg. We would like to start the shipment as soon as possible, but due to other commitments, we cannot begin until May 3rd. Could you please advise if this timeline works for you?

email_chain.subject: Ammonia Shipment Offer - Newark to Veracruz
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Please see below an offer for service for shipment of 5,000MT of ammonia from Port Newark, New Jersey to Veracruz, Mexico. Could you kindly confirm your port and quantity requirement to provide us with a further breakdown of your offer requirements?

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Re: Ammonia Shipment Offer - Newark to Veracruz
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Could you please confirm your port of discharge in Veracruz, Mexico?

Regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Re: Ammonia Shipment Offer - Newark to Veracruz
email_chain.body:
Dear Bill,

Sorry for the delay, but we just completed the sample test for your verification. Our lab tested an average sample of 10 kilograms, which is approximately equal to 10% of the sample size of the cargo. We tested by digesting 50 grams of each sample for 10 minutes, digesting 100 grams of each sample for 5 minutes, and testing 50 grams of each sample for 10 minutes. The best test results from these 3 tests were used to determine the results.

Results for the test indicate that the ammonia content is within acceptable limits for ammonia acceptance.

Kindly acknowledge the receipt of the same for your verification and record.

Thank you,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Ammonia Shipment Offer - Newark to Veracruz
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

We are pleased to note that the ammonia test results are satisfactory. Regarding your ammonia shipment, we have now agreed to an FOB sale. Kindly acknowledge our FOB sale for your record. We have also sent you an offer of sale for a quantity of 5,000MT of ammonia via shipping carrier Alstec. Please confirm both the FOB sale and acceptance of our shipping carrier offer.

Best regards,
Bill Pineda

email_chain.subject: Re: FOB Sale Confirmation - Ammonia Shipment
email_chain.body:

Supplier: Robert Pitts
Purchase order number: 000133709-01
Quantity: 5000MT
Item: Ammonia (NH3)
Port of Export: Port Newark, New Jersey
Port of Discharge: Veracruz, Mexico
Cargo Arrival date: Jan 1, 2008
FOB price: US$ 300,000

Please confirm receipt of this email for your record.

Regards,
Robert Pitts

email_chain.body:

I've heard good things about the methods that you've been using to combat this problem, and I'm sure that they will continue to improve as time goes on. Don't forget to keep up with your self-care routine and take breaks when you need them. These strategies can really help you stay focused and energized throughout the day. Let me know if there is anything else that I can do for you.

Hope you have a great rest of your week!

Emma

email_chain.body:

Thanks!

Regards,
Sam

email_chain.subject: Re: Terminal Information Request - Marseille Fos
email_chain.body:
Thanks Sam,

We have two terminals in Fos, Marseille:

Fos-Port Express Terminal:
This terminal is ideally situated at the maritime Port of Fos, only 45 minutes from Marseille/Provence Airport. It's perfect for distribution to various European countries including Italy, Portugal, Spain, Germany, and others. We offer both sea and air access points, including access to the MED terminal with two docks for 40' and 20' shipping containers. We can accept high cube containers on all shelves.

Fos-Port International Terminal:
This terminal is easily accessible [details as provided].

Regarding your specific questions:
- Port Name: Marseille Fos
- Carriage Zone: Customs
- Free Zone Type: Central Customs Zone
- Free Zone Entry/Exit: None required
- 20FT container dimensions: 12' 2'' x 7' 2'' x 8'

Best regards,
Eddy

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Shipment Quote Follow-up
email_chain.body:

I'm still waiting for your reply to my email from two weeks ago. Are you going to ship me 5,000MT of naphtha from Singapore to Yokohama? As discussed, it was a no-risk situation for me with a 30-day transit time. Would you agree to my proposed terms?

Best regards,
Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Shipment Quote Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Yasmine,

Thank you for your email. I apologize for my delayed response to your email from April 15th. I have been extremely busy with an engineering project for a European company that will start in September.

Regarding the shipment, I agree it is indeed a no-risk deal. I would like to discuss the details in person. Our meeting schedule can be adjusted to meet your needs. Please let me know what days and times work for you.

Thank you again,
Stanley

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wong,

My apologies for the delayed response. We had a scheduled vacation and were delayed due to a family emergency. I will be able to meet you next week at your convenience. Please let me know a time and place that works for you.

Thank you,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Meeting Schedule
email_chain.body:
Dear Paul,

Thanks for your quick response. The timing is perfect. Let me know your preference. Are you planning on meeting at your office?

Thank you,
Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Meeting Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Stanley,

Our meeting is on the 8th of July. I will meet you at 8:00 PM at Kakinoki station.

Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Presentation Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Stanley,

Thank you so much for the presentation. I would like to continue discussing this deal. Let's talk again after I have evaluated it. This deal can create a long-lasting partnership between our companies.

Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Presentation Follow-up
email_chain.body:
Dear Yasmine,

I'm glad that the presentation went well. I will be contacting you later this week regarding the meeting. Thanks again.

Stanley

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Changes Required to Shipping Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nelson,

I've just received the status on your offer. The following changes are required:

- The per ton container rates should be reduced to $500
- The preferred delivery days for the cargo are every Monday and Thursday
- We will accept a $40 per day demurrage fee
- I'd like to negotiate to reduce the demurrage fee to $20 per day for containers not used within 30 days

Kind regards,
Lucy

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Laycan Updates Required
email_chain.body:
Hello William,

Our latest UPS files show delayed assignments for all of our shipments. This is not typical of your usual performance, so we have started looking into alternate carriers. I believe the issue lies with your laycan estimates.

Could you please update them with a 2-week adjustment?

Please reply as soon as possible, as we are receiving some interesting proposals from other carriers.

Kind regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Laycan Updates Required
email_chain.body:
Thanks Charles,

I'm responding as quickly as possible. The Northeast region is currently experiencing severe weather conditions, with all Metro stations shut down. This has not only affected my email access but has also significantly impacted our laycan estimates.

Many of our hubs have modified their flight schedules to accommodate these weather delays, and I will need to update the laycan estimates accordingly. I'll send you a detailed report of these adjustments shortly. I wanted to explain that the delay in providing these estimates is directly related to the current weather situation.

Thanks for your understanding.

Regards,
William

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Laycan Updates Required
email_chain.body:
Thanks for letting me know. I'll follow up once I receive your report.

Regards,
Charles

Looking forward to seeing you,
Rob

email_chain.body:

Best Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Laboratory Testing Request
email_chain.body: When will the laboratory be available to conduct quality testing on the latest batch from our supplier? We need comprehensive analysis to verify compliance with our standards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Laboratory Testing Request
email_chain.body: Due to the complexity of these tests, they need to be run in our laboratory. Preparing the experiment may take several hours, and in some cases, we'll need to send samples to a third-party lab, which could take several days. This is necessary to ensure accuracy and reliability of the final results. I'll schedule this for this Friday.

email_chain.subject: Re: Laboratory Testing Request - Results
email_chain.body: I wanted to inform you that the sample was analyzed today. The quality issues we've identified mean this batch cannot be approved until the supplier implements corrective actions. I estimate it will take about a week for the supplier to implement these changes, after which we can submit another request for QCP approval. We'll need to verify that these corrective actions are properly implemented in their system.

email_chain.subject: Supplier Quality Review Findings
email_chain.body: My team has completed a comprehensive quality review of the supplier's product history. We've discovered that there have been consistent problems with their products since the beginning of our relationship. All produced items show defects that violate our working standards. The root cause appears to be their lack of documented process controls in production. While they claim to have been working on this issue, no effective solution has been implemented yet. Please let me know if you need any additional information to address this situation.

email_chain.subject: PS Irene - Discharge Cargo Documentation
email_chain.body:

You can use LOI 1001191957 attached.

Dana

email_chain.subject: Generator Requirements Query
email_chain.body:
Hey Arjun,

I have a new project where we're going to need a 4000kVA high-power generator, along with a 150kVA low-power generator. Can you give me some ballpark pricing estimates, or refer me to a competent electrician?

Best,
Vlad

email_chain.subject: Re: Generator Requirements Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Arjun,

I just recalled the excellent work you did on our backyard garden pond - I can't believe how professional and clean your work was. Given this quality, I'm curious about your company's commercial project capabilities. Could you send me some reference projects? I know you were very busy recently with our backyard pond, but we're particularly interested in your industrial, power, and commercial project portfolio.

Best,
Vladimir Ivanov

email_chain.subject: Re: Generator Requirements Query
email_chain.body:
Arjun,

I need a comprehensive spreadsheet with prices for various power and industrial projects, with the cost breakdown, including materials and labor. We'll need a separate sheet for each project as we're tracking multiple projects simultaneously. Our previous experiences with other companies were problematic due to combined cost calculations leading to inflated estimates. I'm looking for straightforward pricing with overall project costs rather than itemized estimates.

Best regards,
Vlad

email_chain.subject: Re: Generator Requirements Query
email_chain.body:
Sorry, Arjun,

While I appreciate your project work, the prices for the last two projects were not satisfactory. I've decided to switch to a different electrical company. It's a difficult decision, but necessary. No need to get upset - just wanted to let you know.

Best,
Vladi
Vladimir Ivanov

email_chain.subject: Re: Generator Requirements Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Vladimir,

I apologize for my brief and inconsistent communication lately. ProjectPlex has been growing rapidly, and we've faced some personal challenges. You may recall my dental procedure from a few years ago that resulted in extended downtime. My wife and I were experiencing financial difficulties then, which affected our pricing and service delivery. I understand this doesn't excuse the recent pricing issues, but I'm committed to making things right. I hope we can maintain our working relationship despite these challenges.

Best regards,
Arjun Singh

- Delivery within 1 week of loading
- Tare: 7.5 tonnes
- Net Gross weight: 95.0 - 7.5

James

email_chain.subject: Urania Cargo Operations - Granules Delivery
email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: Re: Urania Cargo Operations - Granules Delivery
email_chain.body:
Hello Anthony,

Thank you for your email.

The UCRATIS team has decided to take action in a different direction. The vessel Urania's communication with local authorities is sufficient for environmental safety compliance. Our communications with nearby towns can be found at: https://www.comportadecreciente.com/comporta.html

Regarding the lagoons, the port authority will continue their inspections and reporting. Please refer to the annex for details on port authority responsibilities.

Please note that any final assessment of damages and liability will fall under tribunal jurisdiction, not UCRATIS.

Best regards,
Mr. Lin

email_chain.subject: URGENT: Urania - Vessel Grounding Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lin,

The owner and charterer of the Urania have decided to take immediate action and ground the vessel in Escombreras Bay. This decision is due to the alarm generated by the cargo spill from illegal poaching activities and the vessel's unauthorized 8-hour departure from Malaga port.

We request your agreement to ground the vessel in Escombreras Bay, in compliance with our charter agreement (non-arbitral). Please advise on the timeline for authorization of this operation.

Best regards,
Jonathan Hagan

I need to know your margin for calculation purposes. Could you also confirm if you'd like a quote for groupage charges?

Best regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Shipment Kavala to Odessa - 2,000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Spivakova,

I've calculated the possible shipping costs as follows:

Full Container Load (FCL) - 400 EUR
Groupage 24 MT - 210 EUR

Based on my margin calculations, FCL shipping would be the most cost-effective option.

Please let me know if I've missed any considerations.

Best regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Shipment Kavala to Odessa - 2,000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Jonas,

Thank you for your email. I've calculated the margin based on full container load for Kavala to Odessa as:
0.4 * 120000 / 12 = 2000 USD

We should be able to apply the 400 EUR surcharge for any container size, not just 20ft containers.

Could you please review and advise?

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Shipment Kavala to Odessa - 2,000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

I noticed a discrepancy in the calculations. The margin from our survey is 36%, not 12%. Could you please confirm this adjustment?

Best regards,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Previous CPO Shipment Update
email_chain.body:
Sir,

We have received your email, and the last batch arrived this afternoon. As per our discussion, the quantity we shipped is 3,500MT, and total FOB is US$10,000,000. Therefore, the FOB value is US$3,000 per ton.

Kindly arrange your forwarder. We will be ready to send your samples within the next two weeks, and the full payment should be completed within 15 days after the shipment has arrived in your country.

Regards,
Nathan

email_chain.subject: Re: Previous CPO Shipment Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Nathan,

Thank you for your email. You mentioned the quantity is 3,500MT at US$3,000 per ton.

Yours sincerely,
Mr. Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Previous CPO Shipment Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tom,

Thank you for your email. I think your offer is reasonable. However, I would need more information about your company and our potential transaction. Please send me your company documentation and reference certificates. Once received, I can provide our product specifications and photos.

Kind regards,
Nathan

email_chain.subject: Rate Request - Varnish Shipment St. Louis to NOLA
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Wood,

We have 300MT of varnishes to ship from the port of St. Louis to New Orleans, and I'm looking for your spot rate. Could you also confirm if you'll be handling the documentation?

Thank you,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Varnish Shipment St. Louis to NOLA
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

I apologize, but we don't currently handle varnish shipments to the New Orleans area. If you have other products not restricted in our system, I'd be happy to assist with rates and documentation.

Please let me know if you have any other shipping needs I can help with.

Best regards,
Sarah Wood

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Varnish Shipment St. Louis to NOLA
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wood,

Thank you for your prompt response. I understand about the varnish shipment. As a logistics consultant, I'd actually like to discuss how I might help you with better rates for your shipments. My services are free of charge with no obligation. I've found I can often secure better rates than current market prices.

Would you be open to a call next week to discuss potential collaboration?

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Varnish Shipment St. Louis to NOLA
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the call and your offer to help. While I appreciate the opportunity to learn from market competitors, I have concerns about working with free quote services. Without firm commitments, it's difficult to ensure consistent service quality for our clients.

Let's stay in touch, and perhaps we can explore specific projects in the future where our interests align.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Varnish Shipment St. Louis to NOLA
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Wood,

I understand your position regarding my offer. While I'm disappointed we couldn't work together, I remain open to discussing ways to optimize shipping costs. Perhaps it would be best to be direct about such opportunities in the future to avoid any misunderstandings.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
Maria

- Origin/Port of Loading: Bangkok, Thailand
- Destination/Port of Delivery: Mombasa, Kenya
- Loading Date: Nov 15, 2022
- Discharge Date: Nov 25, 2022

K. Sanasand

email_chain.subject: Updated Laycan Information
email_chain.body:
We have reviewed all laycan options for the fleet. Here is the most updated information regarding charter costs and timing:

Laycan for this fleet must be on or after July 1st. For the latest fleet, we're currently looking at July 15th as being the optimal laycan date, as subsequent freight options are limited.

Please consider these dates when planning your production schedules.

email_chain.subject: Shipment Risk Assessment Document
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Crude Oil Shipment Request - Shah Deniz to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Moutran,

Please let me know if that's doable?

Looking forward to it,
Rashid

email_chain.subject: Pipeline Construction Contract
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Moutran,

Congratulations on winning the contract! I hear you're starting construction of the pipeline by the end of the month.

My contact at the Ministry of Energy has suggested creating a technical trade diversion scheme to bypass our Russian pipeline monopoly. I'm preparing a detailed document for your review.

Please let me know when you have time to meet?

Thanks and best wishes,
Rashid

email_chain.subject: Re: Pipeline Construction Contract
email_chain.body:
Hey Rashid,

I'm concerned about your friend's suggestion from the Ministry. Such a plan seems questionable, and I suspect his motivation is purely profit-driven regarding the technical route. We should proceed with the original contract signing first. I can discuss any alternative proposals with him afterward.

Thanks and best,
Moutran

email_chain.subject: Technical Route Proposal - Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moutran,

Regarding the technical route proposal, here are the key benefits:
- Potential profit increase of up to 200M USD
- Estimated construction cost of 1.2B USD (based on professional engineering assessment)
- Possible 200M USD savings through equipment procurement
- Additional savings through strategic cement sourcing (specifically high-quality cement with 3% sulfur from Azerbaijan)

Please note that while this would be a new construction, compared to the existing Soviet-era infrastructure, it offers significant advantages.

Looking forward to your feedback,
Rashid

email_chain.subject: Cocoa Beans Shipment - Cotonou to New Orleans

email_chain.subject: Re: Cocoa Beans Shipment - Cotonou to New Orleans
email_chain.body:
Dear Cristina,

Sorry for the delay. The routing will be Cotonou - Lagos - Tamanrasset - Fort de France. The vessel has been chartered, and we're waiting for the sailing schedule.

Regards,
Anne

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Quote Request - Newcastle to Melbourne

Madelyn

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Quote Request - Newcastle to Melbourne
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Rice Shipment Hong Kong to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi there,

I'm shipping 1,300MT of rice from Hong Kong to Qingdao. I could be flexible on the ETA, but you would need to deliver by January 10th. What's your idea?

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Rice Shipment Hong Kong to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I understand you're seeking a shipping line for your rice cargo. Given your January 10th deadline, I can propose several routing options.

The key factors we need to consider are:
1. Transit time and potential weather delays during this season
2. Vessel availability at Hong Kong port
3. Berthing schedule at Qingdao

Could you please confirm if you have any specific requirements regarding vessel type or preferred departure dates? This will help me provide you with the most suitable options.

Best regards,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Wood Pulp Shipment Query - Vlissingen to Qingdao

email_chain.subject: Re: Wood Pulp Shipment Query - Vlissingen to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Cindy,

Thank you for your inquiry about the wood pulp shipment from Vlissingen to Qingdao.

I've contacted our offices in China regarding your request. They are ready to discuss the transportation arrangements immediately. Regarding bunker surcharges, we would need your expected shipment date to provide accurate information about any additional charges.

Please let us know your planned shipping timeline so we can assist you better.

Kind regards,
Anthony

email_chain.subject: AIP Program Invitation

email_chain.subject: Re: CPO Cargo Inquiry - Houston to Veracruz

Marketing Team

email_chain.subject: Base Oil Shipment Request - Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Moynihan,

I was wondering if you had the capacity to move 8,000MT of base oil from Rotterdam to Singapore? We have a laycan of April 5th and are looking to make this commitment.

Thank you,
Wendi

email_chain.subject: Re: Base Oil Shipment Request - Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Moynihan,

I hope this email finds you well. I am following up regarding the 8,000MT of base oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The laycan remains April 5th.

We have updated the trading route to Europe > Asia. I have attached the latest tank instructions and will forward you a PDF copy of the contract shortly.

Please note that the current contract expires on March 31st at 3pm Singapore time. I would like to discuss the possibility of extending this deadline to allow all parties sufficient time to complete the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Wendi

email_chain.subject: Re: Base Oil Shipment Request - Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Dear Wendi,

Thank you for your emails. I need to review the new contract before proceeding further. The April 5th laycan is quite tight given the current timeline.

Regarding the Europe > Asia route, I need to understand your specific requirements. Would you consider routing through North America as an alternative? We could arrange shipment via either US or Canadian ports if that would be more feasible.

Please send the new contract for review as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Brian Moynihan

email_chain.subject: LNG Cargo Inquiry - Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Felton,

Can your vessel hold a 12,500MT cargo of LNG from Rotterdam to Singapore? Are you able to let us know the fuel surcharge per day, and what's your laycan?

Cheers,
Calvin

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Cargo Inquiry - Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Greetings Mr. Felton,

I hope this email finds you well.

We just received your proposal for our LNG requirement. I was wondering if there is anything that we can do to improve our request, and improve your availability? We do not require emergency availability for this contract and our expected cargo start date is the 4th of September.

Please let us know if there is any other information that we can provide.

Thank you,
Calvin
Global Energy Trading Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: LPG Cargo Inquiry - Jebel Ali to Pusan

email_chain.subject: Re: LPG Cargo Inquiry - Jebel Ali to Pusan

email_chain.subject: Vegetable Oil Shipment Quote Request - Chicago to LA

email_chain.subject: Re: Vegetable Oil Shipment Quote Request - Chicago to LA

email_chain.subject: Re: Vegetable Oil Shipment Quote Request - Chicago to LA
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Vegetable Oil Shipment Quote Request - Chicago to LA

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Bangladesh to Malaysia Vegetables
email_chain.body:
Hi Nate,

I'm writing to follow-up on your quote from yesterday. We're looking at loading 3,600MT of vegetables from Bangladesh to Malaysia. What do you think about my counter-offer of $60/MT DAP?

Regards,
Anneli

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Bangladesh to Malaysia Vegetables
email_chain.body:
Dear Anneli,

Thank you for your counter-offer. Unfortunately, given current market conditions, we cannot accept $60/MT. We need to maintain our original quote considering the route and cargo specifications. Let me know if you would like to discuss alternatives.

Best regards,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Bangladesh to Malaysia Vegetables
email_chain.body:
Dear Nate,

I understand. Unfortunately, our operations have been significantly impacted by inflation lately. We'll need to review our options internally before proceeding.

Sincerely,
Anneli

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Bangladesh to Malaysia Vegetables
email_chain.body:
Dear Anneli,

I appreciate your transparency about the situation. I'll keep your requirements on file, and hopefully we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement in the future when market conditions improve.

Best regards,
Nate

email_chain.subject: Steel Coil Transport Inquiry - Guangzhou to Nantong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Porter,

We're interested in moving some steel coil from Guangzhou to Nantong. Could you give us an idea of what your freight rate will be, and whether you would be able to move it in time to make our deadlines?

Thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport Inquiry - Guangzhou to Nantong
email_chain.body:
Hi Chris,

Thank you for contacting me. As you're aware, we do transport steel coils, but have the service down to only a few weekly trips. I will put in a request to see if I can make the next available route to cover your needs.

If you can hold a few weeks for our service, it will be the most economical. I have included some of our general pricing for similar services so you can understand the value of our services.

I would highly recommend loading the cargo with the opening side up for more protection from the elements.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions.

Regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport Inquiry - Guangzhou to Nantong
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your reply. We would be very grateful if you could cover this run. We're on very tight deadlines and need the product to make the end of February. Our shipping company has been slow.

Can you also confirm the price you are charging, per ton of cargo?

Many thanks,
Chris

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport Inquiry - Guangzhou to Nantong
email_chain.body:
Hello Chris,

I'm working with our booking agents to secure the necessary booking for your cargo. As I mentioned previously, our route operates once a week, but due to a change in our routing, I have confirmed that we can add this item onto our next available run. The vessel will be on route to China on the 24th of this month and will have this cargo on the ship.

I'm still waiting on a rate quote from our container freight forwarder. I will let you know when I have the information.

Regards,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Diesel Purchase Inquiry - 5MT from Dar es Salaam

email_chain.subject: Re: Diesel Purchase Inquiry - Ordering Procedure
email_chain.body:

I have been given the task of placing an order for diesel for the organization. What is the standard procedure for ordering the fuel? Can I expect a price quotation from your company?

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Diesel Purchase Process
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Kitonga,

Thank you for your reply regarding the fuel purchase for the company. I've been informed that the process requires visiting your main office at 14-17 Nairobi Street, Kampala. I understand I should meet with the office manager and provide:

* The quantity of the fuel
* The type of fuel
* The delivery location
* The desired delivery date

I will proceed with these requirements.

Sincerely,
Jessica Buckle

email_chain.subject: Feed Product Shipping Inquiry - Singapore

email_chain.subject: Chemical Cargo Transport Request - Oujda to Algeciras
email_chain.body:

Can you handle 8,000MT of liquid chemicals from Oujda to Algeciras? If so, could you please contact our representatives in Madrid and quickly get the details signed up for the charter party?

Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Cargo Transport Request - Oujda to Algeciras
email_chain.body:

To follow up on my earlier email, here are the key details:

Cargo: 8,000MT liquid chemicals
Route: Oujda to Algeciras
Schedule: Arrival 14 August 2021, Departure 27 August 2021
Bank Requirements: 12.5%

We have 30 days from today to secure a vessel. Please indicate which vessel you could allocate for our cargo. If you cannot meet our timeline, please let us know immediately so we can explore other options.

Regards,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Cargo Transport Request - Oujda to Algeciras
email_chain.body:
Dear Gianluca,

I'm providing additional details for the charter:

1. Route: Oujda to Algeciras
2. Loading date: 15/8/2021 in Oujda
3. Delivery date: 26/8/2021 in Algeciras
4. Cargo: 8,000MT liquid chemicals
5. Packaging: Steel canisters (dimensions to be confirmed)
6. Bank: 12.5% C&B, due before shipping

Our agents in Madrid can complete the contract within 30 days.

Best regards,
Sabeel

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Cargo Transport Request - Final Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Gianluca,

Here are the final cargo specifications:

1. Cargo amount: 8,000MT chemicals
2. Dimensions: 12m x 20m x 15m
3. Packaging: Steel containers
4. Loading start date: 8 August 2021
5. Delivery date: 28 August 2021

Please confirm if you can accommodate this cargo. We are ready to proceed with vessel booking upon your confirmation of vessel details.

Best regards,
Sabeel

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Polypropylene Inquiry - 3,200MT Harare Discharge
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

I have some questions to clarify before finalizing the deal:

1. What is your expected completion date for the order?
2. Could you provide the total shipment cost breakdown?
3. Please confirm that the cargo will be 100% polypropylene with no other materials included.

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Polypropylene Inquiry - 3,200MT Harare Discharge
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Could you please respond urgently to my previous email? I need confirmation regarding the cargo composition and whether you plan to proceed with the shipment given the volume requirements.

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Natural Gas Cargo Inquiry - Casablanca to Lisbon
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Morrow,

Thank you for your prompt response. We're planning a 3,200MT cargo of natural gas from Casablanca to Lisbon. Can you confirm if your vessel can handle a mid-April laycan, and at what cost?

Sincerely,
Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Re: Natural Gas Cargo Inquiry - Casablanca to Lisbon
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Ishaan,

Yes, our vessel is available for a mid-April laycan. Our pricing proposal is as follows:
- $100,000 on account
- $50,000 at delivery

The laycan would be for arrival on May 5th in Lisbon. This is our exclusive offer given the expedited timeframe requested. Please confirm acceptance within 24 hours.

Yours truly,
Noah Morrow

email_chain.subject: Re: Natural Gas Cargo Inquiry - Casablanca to Lisbon
email_chain.body:
Dear Noah,

Thank you for your kind offer, however, I'm afraid we'll have to decline. We're currently looking at shipping our cargo via a shorter, more cost-efficient route. However, if you can provide a lower rate, we might reconsider.

Best regards,
Ishaan

email_chain.subject: Re: Natural Gas Cargo Inquiry - Casablanca to Lisbon
email_chain.body:
Dear Ishaan,

Thank you for your response. I regret that we cannot offer a lower rate for this route and timeline. I understand you'll be pursuing alternative arrangements. Please keep us in mind for future shipments.

Best regards,
Noah Morrow

email_chain.subject: Mango Juice Shipment - Maasai Mara to Lomé
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Sringeri,

Looking to move 5000MT of mango juice from Maasai Mara to Lomé. We'd like to take this booking immediately but need your confirmation on the freight rate of 1200USD (port to port).

Please let me know if you're available or if you want to discuss this further over the phone.

Warmly,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Mango Juice Shipment - Maasai Mara to Lomé
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I accept your offer. Could you please provide the following details?
- Port of Origin and destination Port
- GIN Code

All this information is available at our website http://www.africanshipping.net if you have any questions.

Warmly,
Mukesh

email_chain.subject: Re: Mango Juice Shipment - Maasai Mara to Lomé
email_chain.body:
Dear Mukesh,

I have emailed you the required information. I also have a few additional questions:

1. What is your Port of Load?
2. What is the appropriate GIN Code for this shipment?
3. How long will it take for the shipment to arrive in Lomé?
4. Is this an express shipment?
5. How much is the shipment value?
6. When should we expect the shipment to arrive?
7. Does the shipment come with insurance?

Please confirm receipt of these items and respond with a yes or no answer to each question.

Warmly,
Sarah
