email_chain.subject: Gasoline Shipment Inquiry - Baku to Al Sharqia
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Bernard,

I am traveling to Baku, and I want you to ship 2,800MT of gasoline from there to Al Sharqia. I am sure there will be some delay at the port, but I am not sure whether that is part of the delivery time or not. Could you please explain the procedures for your company to take such situations into account?

Thank you,
Linda

email_chain.subject: RE: Documentation Issue - Tank Measurements
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bernard,

I am sorry, but you must not send your documents with the tank measure numbers on it. We are going to have an examination on the delivered gasoline, and we need to know what quantity we are getting to do that. I will appreciate it if you could send the updated copies of your invoice without the tank measure numbers.

Thank you,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Additional 1,200MT Gasoline Order to Tripoli
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bernard,

I need you to ship 1,200 MT of gasoline to Tripoli from your company. We have a contract with another company that is providing us with 2,400 MT for our needs, but we did not receive the full amount due to the delay in transportation, and we only have the means to buy what we have in our budget. We will have to stop the buying and do something about the current shortage of fuel, and so, I have made an immediate order of 1,200 MT that I would like you to deliver.

I hope you will be able to help us and deliver the fuel immediately.

Thank you,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Delivery Time Concerns
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bernard,

I know you are trying to do your best, but I would like to talk to you about the time that is needed for the shipping and delivering of the fuel. My company needs to continue the imports of fuel because of the winter weather and also because of the heat wave. Unfortunately, the delay in the delivery of the fuel is really harming our business. Could you please think of something that you can do to avoid the delays? I think you understand what I am trying to say because your company is also in the same line of business that we are in.

Thank you for listening,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Market Update - Vessel Issue in Australia
email_chain.body:
Hi Sergei,

A vessel was stranded off Australia due to mechanical failure. This has caused a significant reduction in transport to that area, and it has caused a shortage of supply. I've found some information that may help you prepare for the new market conditions, and I'm attaching this file for your presentation.

I hope this helps and that you are not affected by these disruptions.

Best wishes,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Review Request - Presentation Questions
email_chain.body:
Hi Sergei,

I was wondering if you would have a look at my presentation, as I have some questions I would like to have clarified. Would you be free to look at it this afternoon or tomorrow?

Thanks,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Food Processing Section Review Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Sergei,

I hope that you are well.

I am in the final stages of preparing my final report on the quality of agricultural products, and I have included a section in the report that relates to food processing. As my PhD is focused on food processing, I thought it would be beneficial to include this section. I was wondering if you could review this section with me, as I am unsure about how the key concepts are linked. I am also unsure how to apply the concepts to industry, and would be grateful for your input and guidance.

I look forward to hearing from you,

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Urgent capacity enq - Dubai to Mauritius
email_chain.body:

I am a bulk owner and need your help with the provision of space for 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets from Dubai to Mauritius. We have a next laycan 23rd March and we need to know ASAP if your containership is available for the voyage.

I am in India now and unable to finalize rate and booking – can we do so via fax and email?

Kind regards,
Max

email_chain.subject: FYI - Regarding your enquiry about 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets
email_chain.body:
Dear Max,

I am answering on behalf of our CEO, Berdous Weitz.

I have just reviewed your email and unfortunately I am unable to offer you a cargo space for this size of quantity on our container ship, SINGAPORE EXPRESS. However, on my insistence, I am doing a full quote of our available space from Singapore to Mauritius (two legs) and will send you the rates as soon as it's available. Hopefully I will get the confirmation later this week and let you know.

In the meantime, let's just agree that we will start with a fixed rate offer. I suggest that you send me a proposal and we can then adjust the rates to the amounts to be loaded.

Kind regards,
Berdous Weitz

email_chain.subject: RE: Regarding your enquiry about 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

The company will proceed with a new offer for 1.8MMT LDPE pellets. If this offer is satisfactory, please fax/email me the cargo details in the first instance.

Kind regards,
Berdous Weitz

email_chain.subject: RE: Regarding your enquiry about 1.8MMT of LDPE pellets
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Berdous,

We are not interested in this shipment.

Kind regards,
Max

email_chain.subject: Happy 2025!
email_chain.body:
Hello Eric,

As our customers all around the world may have noticed, we are introducing a new range of wooden LEGO products. We think they are going to be a huge hit with children.

We are offering a special 20% discount for any purchases above 1 million units. This special promotion expires on January 3rd, so hurry!

Best wishes,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Notice: Safety Testing Results for Wooden LEGO
email_chain.body:
Dear Eric,

I wanted to update you on our wooden LEGO initiative. We've been working with a major manufacturing partner in China to establish our wood processing operation. Quality and safety are our top priorities.

We've conducted extensive safety testing, sending 500 sample units to a certified laboratory for analysis. The results confirm that our wooden LEGOs are as safe as our traditional plastic products. They meet all safety standards and are certified non-toxic, non-irritating, and durable.

Best regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Natural LEGO: International Distribution Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Eric,

Following successful distribution in China, we're seeing strong demand from European markets, including Germany, France, Austria, and the Netherlands.

To facilitate international expansion, we're establishing a network of authorized agents. We're offering a 20% commission to agents who sign distribution contracts with us.

We believe this will help us meet the growing demand for our wooden LEGO products across multiple markets.

Sincerely,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Urgent Quote Request - Oversized Cargo LA to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
I am urgently shipping several spare parts from Los Angeles to Hamburg. The total weight is 2,800MT and 27mm oversized shipping, with earliest arrival needed next week. Could you provide your best estimate, ASAP?

Sincerely,
Calvin

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Quote Request - Oversized Cargo LA to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Calvin,

Thank you for your inquiry. We'd be glad to offer you a quote for your shipment.

To provide an accurate quote, we need the following details:
- Number of packages
- Weight per package
- Dimensions of each package
- Exact pickup location in Los Angeles

This information will help us determine the most suitable transport method.

Please note that I will be traveling to California for the next two days, but I will follow up with you upon my return.

Best regards,
Freight Forwarding Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Quote Request - Oversized Cargo LA to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Calvin,

Thank you for providing the additional information. We will prepare a shipping offer shortly.

Best regards,
Freight Forwarding Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Quote Request - Oversized Cargo LA to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Calvin,

After reviewing your shipment details with our marketing department, we can offer two options:

1. Air Freight (via DHL Air Courier):
- Fastest transit time
- Ideal for time-sensitive cargo
- Warehouse storage available through our agents if needed
- Delivery times may vary by up to 24 hours
- Higher cost option

2. Sea Freight:
- More economical option
- Longer transit time

Please let us know which option you prefer to proceed with detailed pricing.

Best regards,
Freight Forwarding Team

email_chain.subject: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Ross,

Do you remember the delivery incident of Ethanol from Vigo to Fos sur Mer? It would be best to prepare the load list and schedule to avoid similar occurrences in the future.

Best regards,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body: Yes, I remember it very well. I would like to know what went wrong and what lessons we can draw from it. Most importantly, how do we ensure there will be no similar incident in future? We would like to avoid repeating that error, especially with respect to environmental hazards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body:
My team will examine the incident carefully and get back to you. However, our aim should be to minimize similar situations and have accident-free operations. Our organization should be committed to environmental safety as we all have a responsibility to protect our planet.

Best,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body: Well, we cannot depend on individuals alone, our systems are equally important. We should have systems in place to ensure that employees act correctly. Our goal should be to ensure safety and avoid errors in future.

email_chain.body:
Nick,

Thank you for your inquiry. We need some clarification regarding the operation. We can offer to move 50% of the crude volume you mentioned, but we need to confirm the specific terms and conditions.

We currently have another interested party for the same route and timeframe, so please advise your requirements as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Transport Request - Tianjin to Shekou
email_chain.body:

To clarify, we're looking to connect with a supplier who can provide both the crude oil and vessel transport to our tanker (PCTC FEDRA REY). We are not seeking to charter or own the vessel, just arrange the delivery.

Please confirm if you can accommodate these terms.

Best regards,
Nick

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Transport Request - Tianjin to Shekou
email_chain.body:
Dear Nick,

- Cargo: 50,000 MT crude + 5,000 MT soybeans
- Charter rate: USD 23,000 per day
- Loading window: January 27th, 07:00 hrs to January 30th, 22:00 hrs

Please let me know if these terms are acceptable.

Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Perla de Panama Loading Schedule - Houston
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Perla de Panama Loading Schedule - Houston
email_chain.body:
Hello,

I just received a message from my supplier about an emergency delay in the production of some items. Please ensure the loading crew is ready when the Perla de Panama arrives, as we'll need to maximize efficiency during the short loading window.

email_chain.subject: Additional Mosaico Order
email_chain.body:
Dear Jimmy,

Yesterday, I received an order from our client for an additional 15 boxes of the Mosaico product. Please advise on availability and handling.

email_chain.subject: Weather Emergency - Cargo Relocation
email_chain.body:
Hi Jimmy,

I'm sorry to report that we are facing an emergency. The heavy rain last weekend has left our yard in an awful mess. We need to move some cargo to the warehouse to continue with the clearing. Box X45678 must be moved to the warehouse before forwarding.

email_chain.subject: Weather Update and Special Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Jimmy,

The weather has now cleared in all locations, with good forecasts until mid-July. Additionally, I'm pleased to offer a 50% discount on line items Mosaico X45678 and Mosaico X34567. Your new order will be ready for loading tomorrow.

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Schedule Discussion - Ship Delay
email_chain.body:
Hi Rory,

I just had a quick look at the transport options and I'm not surprised that it's proving difficult to find the perfect solution for you. The delay to our ship has significantly impacted our schedule.

Could you please give me a call? This would be easier and faster than exchanging emails. You can reach me at my office number: 2033xxxxxxxx during office hours (0800-1700).

Please let me know if any of these times work for you.

Yours,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Transport Schedule Discussion - Ship Delay
email_chain.body:
Thanks Jonas,

I'm just heading into a meeting and won't be able to step away. I'll be back in the office next Tuesday or Wednesday and can call you then. If you don't hear back from me, it means I won't be able to assist with this matter.

My office hours are from 8:30 AM till 4:30 PM. I'll let you know when I plan to call.

Best regards,
Rory

Available from: Sep 30 till Nov 30

email_chain.subject: Rate Request - Ethanol Shipment Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Chao,

I have received your quotation, but would like to get an extra lay day as load restrictions will prevent us from sailing immediately. Could you please provide your best rate for 10,500MT of ethanol from Aqaba to Busan? The earliest we can commence loading would be in 4 days.

Thank you,
Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Ethanol Shipment Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hello Jan,

Our VLCC is scheduled to sail by middle of next week. While we currently cannot guarantee an extra lay day, we may be able to accommodate this on short notice.

Regarding vessel preparation, please note that we've recently received vessels from Busan with suboptimal ballast conditions. We need to ensure proper ballast management for safe chemical cargo operations.

I recommend proceeding with the standard laytime to secure the best rate. Please advise if you would like to proceed.

Best regards,
Linda Chao

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Ethanol Shipment Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hello Linda,

Thank you for the information. Please note that the tanks are already loaded at 80% capacity with the previous cargo. Could you provide your current rate given these conditions?

Best regards,
Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - Ethanol Shipment Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Jan,

I'll need your cargo specifications to provide the best rate. However, I can offer a solution where we handle the voyage on our VLCC, including bunkering from Busan to Aqaba. You would have the option to either pay for bunkers or arrange your own. A bunker discount at Busan would apply.

We can accommodate approximately 5,500MT if you'd like to proceed with this arrangement.

Please let me know if you would like me to begin the bunker and sailing arrangements.

Best regards,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Gulf Oil Spill Cleanup - Dispersant Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Ambrose,

I'm writing regarding the ongoing cleanup operations in the Gulf of Mexico. Following my site visit this weekend, I wanted to discuss our dispersant requirements for the oil spill remediation effort.

We estimate needing approximately 40,000 tons of chemical dispersants for the removal operation. As you may be aware, major companies like Chevron are currently handling about 40% of the crude oil recovery in the gulf region.

Could you please provide information about your dispersant availability and vessel deployment capabilities? We need to ensure proper coordination for both the dispersant delivery and application.

Best regards,
John Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Gulf Oil Spill Cleanup - Dispersant Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Could you specify which types of dispersants you're looking for? Also, I'd like to understand your plans for controlling the dispersant application path once deployed.

Regards,
Sarah Ambrose

email_chain.subject: Re: Gulf Oil Spill Cleanup - Dispersant Requirements
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

We currently have some dispersant stockpiled and ready for dispatch. Our application method involves dispersing into the water column using either chemical dispersants or in-situ burning. While we've conducted some preliminary in-situ burning tests (pending approval), our main challenge with chemical dispersants is controlling depth and concentration in the water column. The advantage of in-situ burning is better depth control during the process.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Chamber of Commerce Five-Year Goals
email_chain.body:
Hello Commissioner Kennedy,

The local Chamber of Commerce has put together a comprehensive list of goals for our city over the next five years. As the business development coordinator, I'm helping compile these plans and would appreciate the opportunity to discuss our business priorities with you.

I have attached our list of goals for your review, and I look forward to meeting with you.

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Thank you,
Kevin W. Murphy
Business Development Coordinator
City Chamber of Commerce

email_chain.subject: Re: Chamber of Commerce Five-Year Goals
email_chain.body:
Dear Commissioner Kennedy,

I am happy to report that our city has developed a strong vision for the next five years. Our goals are both ambitious and achievable, focusing on sustainable growth and community development.

I have attached our detailed goals to this email. While specific in nature, we believe these objectives will significantly enhance our city's quality of life.

I look forward to meeting with you and hearing your suggestions.

Best Regards,
President
City Chamber of Commerce

email_chain.subject: Input Needed: City Five-Year Plan
email_chain.body:
Dear Commissioner Kennedy,

As the mayor, I would like to get your valuable input on our city's five-year plan. We have identified several key areas that require attention over the next five years, and I believe these goals are achievable with collaborative effort from all stakeholders.

Looking forward to your thoughts on this matter.

Best regards,
Mayor

email_chain.subject: Discussion: Five-Year Goals
email_chain.body:
Dear Commissioner Kennedy,

I hope this email finds you well.

As the new chairperson of our city council, I am committed to advancing our city's development. I believe our proposed goals will bring meaningful positive change over the next five years.

I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss these goals with you and hear your perspective.

Best regards,
Chairperson
City Council

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Hull Inspection Report Request
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the vessel inspection. I've just returned from a business dinner at the Maritime Club in Liverpool. Regarding your vessel inquiry, I'll need to review the hull condition report for the specified vessel.

Please note that for a vessel built in 2000 with DNV-2G steel construction and 100A1 classification, carrying 1500ton bulk cargo capacity, we'll need a current hull survey report to proceed with insurance arrangements.

Best regards,
James Smith

email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your prompt response. We're interested in the vessel's insurance requirements. Given its specifications (Hull #18, 52m length, built 2000), could you please provide details on the required insurance coverage and confirm receipt of the hull condition report?

Best regards,
Maersk Operations

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Proposal

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment - Final Terms

It has been great working with you and your team to settle on the FOB Polotsk and FOB Leknes prices as in your final quote. I am also glad that we were able to negotiate the signing bonus in your favor.

Please find attached an e-invoice for your delivery. We look forward to working with you in the future.

Kind regards,
Markus

email_chain.subject: Chemical Shipment - Discharge Procedure Query

Farah

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Shipment - Discharge Procedure Query
email_chain.body:
Hi Farah,

We have port to destination option on our letter of credit, but you will need to arrange customs declaration to Istanbul.

Regards,

Murray Davidson
Managing Director
Logistics Constructions Pty Ltd
Tel: 0415 461 923
Email: info@logcon.com.au

Physical and financial risk management, Sea and air freight services, customs declarations and physical transit from factories to port. 100% reliability, fast and cost effective.

email_chain.subject: Invoice Discrepancies - Colombo Deliveries
email_chain.body:
Dear LCL Operator,

I have double checked the items in the consignments listed below that you delivered to Colombo in your last shipment. In all cases except one, there is no correspondence in the booking with the actual delivery to the consignee. In some instances the invoices are not attached to the delivery notes.

We are therefore unable to process payment until the following discrepancies are resolved:

1) Invoice #LC-2024-001: Delivery notes attached to consignments show inconsistent invoice numbers
2) Invoice #LC-2024-002: Delivery note shows a different invoice number than booking
3) Invoice #LC-2024-003: Delivery documentation incomplete

Please provide the corrected documentation at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Accounts Department

email_chain.subject: Chemical Spill at Railyard
email_chain.body:
Dear Allied Shipping,

1. Chemical Spill
Tank cars have derailed and released approximately 100,000 lbs of chemical mixture into the Kanawha River.

2. West Virginia Official Response
Governor Tomblin has declared a state of emergency for Jackson and Kanawha counties.

3. Port Closure
The Cosco Kuwait will be non-operational this weekend due to the incident.

Please advise if alternative vessel space is available.

Regards,
John Doe
ExxonMobil

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Spill
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Doe,

Regarding the chemical spill of November 19, 2013 into the Kanawha River:

The river is currently non-navigable. The operators of the oil terminal in Point Pleasant are requesting permission for emergency release of terminal contents into the creek.

Additionally, the Virginians for a Natural Gas Free America group is petitioning for a state of emergency declaration and seeking to shut down the Dominion Natural Gas Pipeline connecting the Richmond area to the compressor station.

Best regards,
Mr. Schmeding
ChemWorld Operations

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: BTI Pulp Shipment - Weight Query and Freight Adjustment
email_chain.body:
Hello Dr. Moreno,

Could you send me the weight confirmation for the 8,000MT of BTI pulp scheduled to arrive at Damen via Colombo, Panama, Suez, on May 21st? Additionally, would you be open to discussing a freight adjustment for the May 10th shipment?

Sincerely,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Re: Panama Canal Transit Update
email_chain.body:
Dr. Moreno,

I wanted to update you on the Panama Canal transit times - the ET is currently 31 hours, which should result in an earlier arrival to Colombo than initially planned. I'll keep you informed of any changes.

Sincerely,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Re: Panama Canal Transit Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Dana,

Thank you for this information. While we haven't seen favorable ET through the canal for that day, we've arranged for a container as backup.

I can confirm that we have space available for a smaller volume of BTI pulp, with shorter transit times. We haven't proposed any payment adjustments yet, but we're open to reviewing any proposal you might have.

Best regards,
Dr. Moreno

email_chain.subject: Early Departure Query
email_chain.body:
Dr. Moreno,

Please let us know if you have any availability for the early departure dates of May 10th and 11th.

Sincerely,
Dana

email_chain.subject: Re: Early Departure Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Dana,

I appreciate your continued communication. We can offer a lower rate for the 9th and 10th of this month. However, due to volume uncertainty, we cannot confirm shipping until at least May 18th. We'll need the exact volume details before proceeding further.

Best regards,
Dr. Moreno

Flevin Ankerman
Maritime Logistics Consultant

email_chain.subject: RE: Crude Oil Transport Quote - Montara to Asaba
email_chain.body:

My client does not expect delivery until January 18th, so if you're willing to provide these services, I'd like you to confirm this shipment by 12:00 PM of the 20th of December.

Sincerely,
Rashida

email_chain.subject: RE: Crude Oil Transport Quote - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am pleased to provide you with a proposal for the provision of transportation services for two shipments of crude oil from Asaba to Moscow, via Montara. Please see the attached quotation for your consideration.

As I previously indicated, the first shipment is expected to arrive at the terminal on the 19th of January. To ensure the delivery of these shipments as specified, I ask that you confirm this service by 12:00 PM of the 22nd.

Thank you for your prompt response to this matter.

Sincerely,
Rachael

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry: Daesan to Kaohsiung
email_chain.body:

We have developed strong links with local factories in Daesan, so you can be confident in our ability to provide a timely supply. As for the weather conditions, we monitor this very closely. However, we do not foresee any significant delays caused by adverse weather conditions, as we have a robust network of ships and container ports that allow us to quickly switch routes in the event of inclement weather.

We hope you find our response helpful, and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Park

Nathan

Jacob Smith

email_chain.subject: First Practice Email - Training Exercise
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

This is my first attempt at professional email writing as part of our training exercise. I understand that mastering this skill will make future correspondence easier. I appreciate your guidance in helping me develop proper business communication skills.

Thank you for your support.

Best regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: First Practice Email - Training Exercise
email_chain.body:
Dear Alice,

Thank you for your first practice email. While I understand we're only in week 2 of the training, there's significant room for improvement in the writing style. Given the investment we've made in organizing this training program, including securing a classroom and developing the curriculum, it's important that we focus on professional communication standards.

I'll provide detailed feedback to help you develop a more professional tone in your future correspondence. Remember that effective writing is crucial for professional credibility.

Best regards,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional Practice Emails
email_chain.body:
Dear Matthieu,

I've been working on additional practice emails as part of the exercise. I appreciate your continued guidance and feedback. Could you please review my latest attempts?

Best regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Additional Practice Emails
email_chain.body:
Dear Alice,

I notice significant improvement in your latest attempts. While I apologize for the delayed start in our previous weeks, I can see you're making good progress. Your dedication to learning is evident, and I agree that writing professional emails becomes more natural with practice.

Regarding your question about using templates from mentor emails - while it's fine to use them as reference points, I encourage you to develop your own writing style within professional parameters.

Let's continue working on your progress.

Best regards,
Matthieu

email_chain.subject: Wool Shipment Inquiry Melbourne-Khoula
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Cui,

I'd like to ship 10,000MT of wool from Melbourne to Khoula. I was wondering if your vessel could make port-to-port delivery by the end of May?

Thanks,
Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Wool Shipment Inquiry Melbourne-Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Leon,

Thank you for your email.

Our latest arrival in Khoula from Australia was 1st April. The empty vessel we use is currently in New Zealand.

The next vessel from Melbourne to Khoula is the XH88, and it will depart on 29th May, with expected arrival at Khoula on 20th June.

Please contact our agent Mr. Johnson to make an order.

P.S: Please note the shipping route of this order should be Canningvale - Khoula, as Khoula is the port of the actual customer, Canningvale is our own factory.

With best regards,
Jake

email_chain.subject: Re: Wool Shipment Inquiry Melbourne-Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cui,

Thank you for your prompt reply.

Regarding the order, could you please confirm the details of XH88? Such as ETA in Khoula, port of loading and departure date, etc. Also, is it possible to charter a smaller vessel for the remaining quantity of 3,000MT (from Canningvale to Khoula)?

Thank you,
Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Wool Shipment Inquiry Melbourne-Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Leon,

Thank you for your email.

The ETA of XH88 in Khoula is 20th June.
The port of loading is Melbourne.
The departure date is 29th May.

We'll discuss the rest of your request.

PS: Please remember to change the shipping route to Canningvale - Khoula, and contact our agent Mr. Johnson to make an order.

Regards,
Jake

email_chain.subject: Re: Wool Shipment Inquiry Melbourne-Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cui,

Please confirm the details of XH88 with your office, then please provide information regarding the charter of a smaller vessel from Canningvale to Khoula by the end of this month.

Thanks,
Leon

email_chain.subject: Re: Wool Shipment Inquiry Melbourne-Khoula
email_chain.body:
Dear Leon,

Thank you for your email.

The following is the information on the XH88:
- Ship Name: XH88
- Port of Loading: Melbourne
- ETA in Khoula: 20th June
- Captain: Captain Shaun Bailey

As the loading port and departure date of this vessel is fixed, there's no possibility to charter a smaller vessel from Canningvale to Khoula for the last 3,000MT.

Regards,
Jake

Thank you,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Re: Fish Feed Order - POI Required for Loading
email_chain.body:
Dear Frank,

I was expecting to hear from you by now about the POI to load our feed. We're running on a tight schedule. Can you please send me the POI and estimated loading time by 10 PM today? Otherwise, we will have to move to our B backup option of loading at South Changjiang.

Thank you,
Yan

email_chain.subject: Re: Fish Feed Order - POI Required for Loading
email_chain.body:
Dear Frank,

We appreciate your patience while we worked to find you a suitable vessel. Unfortunately, due to the high ocean freight rates, it is proving to be more cost effective to send our fish feed by LCL. Please advise whether our team can pick up your order for 1,500 MT of fish feed at your warehouse tomorrow.

You need to release an opening POI to our driver by 2 PM tomorrow. If possible, please advise an estimated loading time. Otherwise, we will need to use our B backup option of loading at South Changjiang.

Thank you,
Yan

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request - KL to Batumi
email_chain.body:

Please have a carrier contact me for quoting round-trip steamship cargo from Kuala Lumpur to Batumi. I need the booking done and signed by Friday to avoid demurrage charges.

Regards,
Matt

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - KL to Batumi
email_chain.body:
Dear Matt,

Thank you for your inquiry. We would be delighted to assist with your shipping requirements. Could you please provide the following information?

1. Commodity details
2. Quantity
3. Dimensions
4. Container type required
5. Loading port specifics
6. Delivery port specifics
7. Expected ETA

We will provide a detailed quote within 1-2 working days once we receive these details.

Regards,
Douglas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - KL to Batumi
email_chain.body:
Dear Matt,

Thank you for providing the information. We need to verify if your commodities are acceptable for sea transport. Our cargo experts will examine the details to ensure compliance with shipping regulations. Please note that certain items like firearms and animal-based products may have restrictions.

Once verified, we will send you a proforma invoice for the booking.

Kind regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - KL to Batumi

My boss says you have a great reputation for delivering on time, and if you could let me know if you have available space on this route I would really appreciate it.

You can email us at buyer@company.com or call our booking office on 01-456-234.

Thanks again for your help,
Buyer

email_chain.subject: Re: Fertilizer Shipment from Adana to Damascus
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Day,

I'm confused about your options of porting. You want to do it at Homs or Tarsus. I had spoken to you that you can only port at Homs. Tarsus will add too much expense. You will need a sub-contractor in Tarsus to take the entire truck, they are already holding the paperwork and they are waiting for your authorization.

I know this sounds odd but this is how this works. They won't agree to it unless they see the confirmation.

Please get back to me asap. Thanks!
Operations Manager

email_chain.subject: Coal Transport Route Query - Felixstowe to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

I hope to speak with you soon,

Melissa

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Transport Route Query - Felixstowe to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Melissa,

There are a variety of ways to get coal to Rotterdam:

The first is rail from Felixstowe to The Hook where it is loaded onto barges.
The second is by sea.

However, the leading inland point for coal from Felixstowe to Rotterdam in July is via rail.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Transport Route Query - Felixstowe to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

Melissa

Andrew

email_chain.subject: Marketing Updates and European Summer Promotions
email_chain.body:
I'd like to suggest adding the following to our marketing materials:

1. Open houses and webinars schedule
2. Written guides to FESCO's various operations
3. Current marketing promotions

Specifically, we should highlight our European Summer Sale:
- 60% off list rates for all containers booked by July 20th, 2019
- Additional 25% discount on European shipments booked before September 1st
- Special promotional rates available for Portugal destinations

Please contact your account manager for full promotion details.

Sincerely,
Diane

email_chain.subject: Re: Marketing Updates and European Summer Promotions
email_chain.body:
Thanks for the information on the special rate. I will add that to my projects. I have a question about the promotion for rail and ocean. Is this only for Europe to North America? Also, can you provide more details about the rail promotion - does it apply to all rail lines?

Thanks,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Marketing Updates and European Summer Promotions
email_chain.body:
The rail promotion applies to any rail mode in any direction for bookings made before July 20th. Please note that these special rates cannot be applied to shipments within North America.

Regarding ocean services, we have promotions available for both U.S. East Coast ports (including NY, Philadelphia, Boston, Baltimore, etc.) and West Coast ports (LA, Long Beach, Tacoma, Seattle, etc.). Gulf ports like Mobile, New Orleans, and Houston are also included.

You can find our complete list of service locations at: http://www.silverferries.com/lotes

email_chain.subject: Re: Marketing Updates and European Summer Promotions
email_chain.body:
I have added the rail promotion to my email signature. I will review the list of Gulf Coast ports and add that information for customers in that region. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do.

Thanks,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Marketing Updates and European Summer Promotions
email_chain.body:
Thanks for the information on the summer sale. I have included this in my customer communications.

Regarding the Portugal rates - could you clarify if these are part of the summer promotion ending July 20th, 2019? Customers should contact their account managers for specific details, correct?

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Palm Oil Shipment Quote Request - Antwerp to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Zhang,

I've confirmed 7,000MT of palm oil from Antwerp to Shanghai. Could you provide us with a quick quote? Do you foresee any port draft limitations?

Kind regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Shipment Quote Request - Antwerp to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Yes, it's confirmed! I'd recommend choosing Neptun (NEO3), which is a hybrid vessel with very low port draft. There's no draft limitation for NEO3 when discharging in the deepwater port.

Best regards,
Tiffany

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Shipment Quote Request - Antwerp to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiffany,

Thanks for your quick response. For the product I'm going to import (yarn and socks, very bulky), which port would you recommend for discharging and costing me least in terms of draft and manpower?

Best regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Shipment Quote Request - Antwerp to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

If you can afford to spend time in the port, we'd recommend leaving the vessel out for 4 days in Nanjing (Nanj). This will allow the vessel to reach maximum draft in Nanjing and improve its discharge efficiency. Since Nanjing has less costs on one side (manpower and cargo handling) and Shanghai on the other (draft and terminal fees), we'd recommend you to start the discharging from Nanjing.

Best regards,
Tiffany

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Shipment Quote Request - Antwerp to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Tiffany,

We have great intentions to work with your company. Thank you for your advice and if possible, could you forward your contact to the right department?

Best regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Shipment Quote Request - Antwerp to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Please find our contact details below:
+65 6225 2226
Tiffany Yu (General Manager)

Best regards,
Tiffany

email_chain.subject: Concerning Kolhe Deal Discussion
email_chain.body:
Good evening Mr. Gates,

On my flight out of Moscow this morning I was accosted by a former Kolhe industrial sales representative who made concerning statements about the deal you're considering with us. He suggested that if I were to report this conversation to certain parties, it would be financially advantageous for me.

Would you be willing to discuss this matter and provide your perspective on these claims?

Best regards,
Sean

email_chain.subject: Re: Kolhe Ignition Tube Proposal
email_chain.body:
Dear Sean,

Regarding your inquiry of September 10th, I can present our current offer:

Kolhe is prepared to supply 1 million ignition tube kits at $100 per unit (standard price $200), provided you commit now. Additionally, we propose a follow-up order of 500,000 kits at $1 million total, plus a long-term commitment for 10 million tubes annually at $200 each.

This arrangement would secure Kolhe's revenue stream until we establish our own production capacity.

Best regards,
Bill Gates

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Medical Records Matter
email_chain.body:
CONFIDENTIAL - Void if not received by September 15, 2001

Dear Mr. Gates,

I am contacting you regarding a matter with the State Department of Public Health in New York. A court order has resulted in the confiscation of certain medical records, which I am currently appealing.

I have notified the Office of the Inspector General and request your assistance in addressing the constitutionality of the 15-day deadline imposed.

Regards,
[Name Redacted]

email_chain.subject: Re: Anonymous letter
email_chain.body:
Hello Mike,

I apologize for my delayed response to your letter. To be frank, I had temporarily set aside your inquiry and subsequently lost track of it. Regarding your question about my capacity, I cannot provide an accurate assessment as I haven't undergone a thorough medical examination in nearly twenty years. I should note that my recent lifestyle habits have affected my heart rate, which has been elevated to approximately 120 BPM.

Regards,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Refrigerated Container Query - Ginger Essential Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Shan,

We are shipping 33,000L of ginger essential oil from San Francisco to Taipei in 12" drums. We're hoping to use your refrigerated containers, since it's a perishable product. Is this possible?

Kind regards,
Kate

email_chain.subject: Re: Refrigerated Container Query - Ginger Essential Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Kate,

Thank you for your email. We're delighted to hear from you and are happy to assist.

The best solution for your needs would be our ISO refrigerated containers, which are specially designed for temperature-sensitive products. We have extensive experience with similar cargo - for instance, we've previously shipped 80,000 cartons of liquid chocolate spread for one of the UK's largest chocolate makers.

We can provide you with a full ISO container for your ginger essential oil, which will ensure that it arrives at your destination in perfect condition. Our service includes container pickup from your warehouse and delivery to your preferred shipping port.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

Kind regards,
James Shan

email_chain.subject: Alaska State Tax Ruling - Ethanol Shipments
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Harrison,

We've been told that a change in the state tax ruling in Alaska could affect our decision to ship ethanol there. Could you inform us how the pending decision will change your rate structure, and when we would see it in effect?

Thanks,
Oliver Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Alaska State Tax Ruling - Ethanol Shipments
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the pending tax ruling changes. I've attached the detailed documentation outlining the proposed changes to ethanol taxation in Alaska.

The key change is that ethanol will be taxed at 60% of the standard fuel tax rate, as opposed to the current structure where it's taxed equally with petroleum-based products. This change would take effect following the passage of the new state law.

Sincerely,
Mollie Harrison
Regional Manager
Alaska State Tax Department

email_chain.subject: Fw: Alaska State Tax Ruling Impact
email_chain.body:
As a company committed to supporting Alaska's energy independence through cleaner, lower-emission fuels, we need to address the upcoming tax changes.

The current situation allows us to offer discounted ethanol rates as the tax structure doesn't differentiate between ethanol and petroleum-based products. However, with the pending legislation, ethanol will be taxed at 60% of the full rate.

We can absorb the tax impact until June 30, 2023, but after that, we'll need to adjust our rates to reflect the new tax structure.

Best regards,
Oliver Smith

email_chain.subject: Adhesives Shipment Rotterdam-Lübeck Inquiry

email_chain.subject: Re: Adhesives Shipment Rotterdam-Lübeck Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Jan,

Thank you for your email. Our first 3,400MT loading slot is available on October 4th, though this being a Monday makes it a challenging window due to typically reduced operations.

We can offer two alternative options:
1. October 1st - Using a larger vessel (subject to our limited summer schedule)
2. October 2nd - Regular schedule, but vessel will be operating at full capacity which may affect loading efficiency

We can confirm final loading dates by October 7th at the latest.

Please let me know which option you prefer so we can proceed with the invoice.

Best regards,
Lie Best

email_chain.subject: Urea Shipment Inquiry - Aqaba to Lattakia
email_chain.body:

I'd like to load 3,000MT of urea fertilizer from Aqaba to Lattakia next week. Do you have a slot?

And, how much is demurrage on delays?

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Shipment Inquiry - Aqaba to Lattakia
email_chain.body:
Hi Kyle,

Thanks for the email. Sorry for the delay - I've been quite busy.

Since you are the owner, I'm responding from my personal email rather than SMED's account. I need some additional information to process your request:

- Can you confirm you have the 3000 MT ready?
- What is the MOIC?
- Do you have a confirmed berth in Aqaba?
- Have you received a proforma invoice?
- Do you have FCA AQH on the Bill of Lading?
- Do you have CW on the bill of lading?
- Can you provide the B/L No and HAWB No?

Once I have these details, I can check port availability and provide you with the best options to optimize service and reduce costs.

Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: 60m Dry Bulk Vessel Charter Inquiry

Regards,
William

email_chain.subject: Re: 60m Dry Bulk Vessel Charter Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi William,

Great to hear from you. I've checked our fleet availability for the summer months you mentioned. We have two suitable dry bulkers that might interest you:

- MV Armati (currently available)
- MV Semara (currently undergoing technical maintenance)

I can send you detailed specifications for both vessels and our complete fleet overview. The Armati is fully operational, though we're still resolving some technical issues with the Semara.

Would you like me to forward the detailed information for both vessels?

Best regards,
Amanda

email_chain.subject: Re: 60m Dry Bulk Vessel Charter Inquiry
email_chain.body:

Thanks for your prompt reply. Yes, I would like to know more about both of these vessels. I will reply in a few days.

Thanks,
William

Ron

Kristian,

I'm reaching out to the carrier about this, but would appreciate your assistance. Could you please provide any relevant pictures to help with the follow-up?

Richard

Greetings!

For reference, we've been working with Albrecht and Petersons since August 2015 handling coffee shipments for Roast Coffee (Trigon) Pvt Ltd.

Key contacts:
Martin Peterson: +49 1512 3664097
Isabell Schmied: +49 163 9431815

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request - 25KMT Coffee Beans to Chennai
email_chain.body:

Attaching the form and photos as requested. Please verify the invoice details at your earliest convenience.

Best regards

email_chain.subject: Re: Chemical Shipment - Cost Summary
email_chain.body:
Mr. Warren,

Freight paid to your ship: 10,000 U.S. dollars
Other fees: 12,000 U.S. dollars
Tankage: 5,000 U.S. dollars

Total: 30,000 U.S. dollars

Thank you for your services, and we look forward to another business opportunity with you in the future.

Tom

Location: The Pasir Panjang Terminal, Singapore
Port: Singapore
Cargo mode: Bulk cargo
Unit of measure: in tonnes
Starting date of load out: 1st November 2018
Ending date of load out: 2nd November 2018
Number of containers: 4,724 units
Number of cargo items: 6,756 items
Quantity: 248 tons
Unit price per ton: $1,500.00

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: STP Paper Shipment Barcelona-Casablanca Query

Ray

email_chain.subject: Re: STP Paper Shipment Barcelona-Casablanca Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Ray,

Thank you for your enquiry. I am sorry but at this time our Operations team has no availability until January. Our charter rates can be viewed on the rate page on our website. These rates are subject to Standard Charters Terms & Conditions.

Please note the rates are offered only on a per direction basis, with allowance for a few days turnaround at sea between outward and return legs. There is no charge for our expert advice on terminal rules. We will contact you once availability has been confirmed and our rates have been reconfirmed.

Kind regards,
Vassili Kakias

email_chain.subject: Re: Express Charter Consolidation Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Vassili,

I trust you are well. I was hoping you could help me regarding some queries:

1. Is it possible to combine freight items on an express charter, and if so, what rates apply?

2. We would like to consolidate 3 flights of around 500 kgs each on one flight to reduce costs and delivery times. Would 3-4 days be a reasonable request time for this service?

Kind regards,
Kurt

email_chain.subject: Re: Express Charter Consolidation Query
email_chain.body:
Dear Kurt,

Thank you for your enquiry.

Regarding your first query, for freight exceeding 3,000kg with two destinations on a single cargo journey, there will be a minimum charge of $5,000 to process as Standard Charters freight.

For your second query, Standard Charters operates on a 40-day turnaround per trip, with up to 5 days allowance for the return leg from airport to airport. Your suggested 3-4 days should be sufficient for cargo collection, unless you prefer to wait and consolidate shipments.

Kind regards,
Vassili Kakias

email_chain.subject: Gelato Shipment Query - Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:

How about 3,300 MT of gelato from Naples to Melbourne? Should we proceed with storage in the cargo hold, or can we split that between the reefer plug and cargo hold?

Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment Query - Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Excellent work today. I understand we've secured 3,000 MT of gelato from Naples for transport to Melbourne.

We need to ensure delivery before the October festival, so timing isn't critical yet. I suggest we consider incorporating this into a larger shipment of Neapolitan foodstuffs to optimize logistics.

Given the increasing demand, we should explore additional gelato orders from Naples for future festivals, though we need to be mindful of the supplier's production limits.

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment Query - Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Mark,

Noted on the larger shipment suggestion. While rail transport might be an option for smaller quantities in the future, it's not viable for this volume.

Regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment Query - Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Daniel,

We need to consider the local market preferences. Given that some Australians prefer traditional ice cream over gelato, how should we adjust our distribution strategy?

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment Query - Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Mark,

We'll focus on commercial distribution for the majority, but I propose donating a portion to hospitals and nursing homes, particularly in Western Australia, to build goodwill and market presence.

Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Gelato Shipment Query - Naples to Melbourne
email_chain.body:
Daniel,

Excellent suggestion. On a related note, I'd like to propose the Matilda Forest Festival - a three-day celebration of music, dance, and food. This could become a significant international event and provide an excellent venue for our gelato distribution.

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.body:
Good afternoon, Mr. Bowles,

I have to apologize, but the final price of asphalt has gone up and we will need a significant increase in your rate. I am hoping for $9,600 instead of $7,000. Please advise as soon as you can.

Our thanks for your time and attention.

Please find attached your contract.

Joe

<Contract.pdf>

email_chain.subject: Re: Asphalt Shipment Rotterdam-Newark Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Joe,

I'm afraid the price increase was a mistake. The original price was just an estimate. Would you kindly update your contract to reflect the $7,000 amount?

Please let me know if there are any other changes we need to make.

Thank you for your prompt attention.

Alisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Asphalt Shipment Rotterdam-Newark Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Alisa,

Our underwriter in Amsterdam got back to us after your phone call. They are reluctant to insure your shipment.

email_chain.subject: Re: Asphalt Shipment Rotterdam-Newark Quote Request
email_chain.body:
For the record, your proposal is back in my in-box and I will be ready to accept your quote in 24 hours. Yes, $7,000 is fine.

Please advise when you are ready.

I am happy to provide any additional information you need.

Joe

email_chain.subject: Cargo Shipment Inquiry - Adhesives and Yeast
email_chain.body:
Dear Shaikh,

We have received a 5,600MT shipment of adhesives from Antwerp to Narva and a 3,600MT of yeast from Fos-sur-Mer to Antwerp. Could you please confirm your earliest loading date for both of them and do you offer a standard dispatch rate if we finish early?

Looking forward to your reply.

Kind regards,
Aleksander

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Shipment Inquiry - Adhesives and Yeast
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Marczyk,

I am in receipt of your enquiry and thank you for giving us the opportunity to supply to your company. Both shipments were off-loaded on 3rd February from the vessel BARGE BRIGADE. After this we hold port-to-port (rORL) terms. We do not issue a standard dispatch rate, but would need to be informed of your earliest loading date to give you a shipping quotation.

Please kindly contact us with this information.

Yours faithfully,
International Forwarding & Shipping GmbH
Tel. +49 221 84 07-40
http://www.ifc-jade.de/en/index.php?id=63

email_chain.subject: Invoice and Letter of Credit
email_chain.body:
Dear Shaikh,

I am sending you an invoice for $4,500 for services rendered in 2011. I will forward you an updated letter of credit for the payment.

The company finances are not very good at the moment, so I have requested a further discount. I hope the courier will arrive with the updated letter of credit in the coming week.

Sincerely,
Aleksander

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice and Letter of Credit
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Marczyk,

I am in receipt of your correspondence of the 21st and 30th of April, and kindly refer to our e-mail exchanges of the 15th, 19th and 21st of February.

Regarding your request for a discount, you previously asked us to discount the amount as agreed on the 14th of February by 5% and paid the balance of the sum of $7,600.00 in Swiss francs to our bank account. Please be informed that we have received the payment of $3,200.00 in Swiss francs in our account on 14th of March 2011, and were not able to apply the 5% discount as requested.

Yours faithfully,
IFC Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Your music recommendation
email_chain.body:
Mike,

I don't understand why you're suggesting I listen to 'Stairway to Heaven' as some kind of solution to my situation. This isn't about reliving the past or trying to recapture old times. I'm going through a difficult period, and your response feels dismissive.

Yes, I'm still single, but that's not the point. I was hoping for actual support and understanding, not musical suggestions. Please take my concerns seriously.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Your music recommendation
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

I apologize if my previous email came across as insensitive. You're right - I should have been more supportive. I know you're going through a tough time, and I want to help. Perhaps we could spend more time talking about what's really bothering you?

I understand your frustration, but please know that I'm here to listen. Trust me when I say I want to help, not make light of your situation.

Let me know if you'd like to talk more about this.

Best,
Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Your music recommendation
email_chain.body:
Mike,

I appreciate your response. I was checking my spam folder earlier because I hadn't heard back from you. I want to be clear - I need to be able to express my feelings without feeling dismissed. This isn't about deleting accounts or leaving; it's about being heard and understood.

Can we start over and have a real conversation about this?

Sarah

email_chain.subject: Cargo Space Request - Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hey Ms. Ballard,

Can you help us fill a few empty slots on a 180-day journey from Singapore to Cape Town? We've got 80,000T of heavy oil and 150,000T of fertilizer that would be a good fit, and we have a COTI discount that we're willing to offer.

Thanks,
Devon

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Space Request - Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hey Devon,

I'm pleased to say that it sounds like we have a solution for you. We can offer the full 180-day turnaround with COTI discount. While we don't have any immediate slots available, we do have 3 openings in 60 days.

If you're interested, please send us your pricing and shipping instructions.

Thanks,
Devon Ballard

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Space Request - Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hey Devon,

We can accommodate you in our next 30-day slot. However, since we'll have some bulk and finished oil going through for that journey, we won't be able to offer the COTI discount. The price will be $40 per ton, and the loading port will be Houston. Please send me your forwarding instructions by 7am tomorrow.

Regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Space Request - Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Devon,

Please disregard my previous email as it was sent in error. While we don't have any free slots for the next 2 weeks, we can accommodate you in our next 60-day slot. We will be carrying bulk oil and finished oil on this journey.

The price will be $40 per ton, with delivery options in Houston or Antwerp. Please let us know by 7am tomorrow if the 60-day slot works for you.

Best regards,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Space Request - Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hey Mark,

No worries about the test email. I'd like to confirm that the 60-day slot proposal works perfectly for us.

Thanks for all your help,
Devon

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Cargo Inquiry - Sohar Export
email_chain.body:
Hello Saima,

Thanks,
Sarfaraz

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Cargo Inquiry - Sohar Export
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarfaraz,

Thanks for your email. As per our agreement you need to submit your L/Cs by the 14th. I would highly recommend submitting them as early as possible. If we receive them by the 14th we would be able to issue the Bill of Lading for this cargo. If we do not receive L/Cs by the 14th, we will not be able to issue the Bill of Lading.

Best regards,
Mohammed

email_chain.subject: New Bitumen Cargo Inquiry - June Loading
email_chain.body:

- Date of loading: June 15th
- Payment terms: D/P 90 Days
- Port of loading: Sohar

Best regards,
Mohammed

email_chain.subject: Re: New Bitumen Cargo Inquiry - June Loading
email_chain.body:
Hi Mohammed,

We would be pleased to load your cargo, but would like to wait till we have the details of your project.

Your project name will be passed to our business development department and they will check it with our clients who have the current details on hand. I would also like to look for availability of space with our local charterer.

In the meantime, do you need any help for chartering a ship?

Best regards,
Saima

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 15,000MT Diesel London-Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Glad to hear from you!

Let me confirm our price for 15,000MT of diesel from London to Hamburg: $1.22/bbl FOB. As for the vessel, yes, our vessel, Agape, will be available next week for loading. The vessel will reach Hamburg around 25th October. The laycan is from 15th October.

As for the demurrage, we normally charge a daily demurrage rate of $2,000. This can be lowered if we're expedited for loading.

Could you please let me know if you would like to proceed with this transaction?

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request - 15,000MT Diesel London-Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Thank you for the confirmation on the price! Regarding the vessel, we will try our best to expedite the loading. We would also like to clarify the following: You mentioned in your last email that your demurrage...

Regards,
Saul

email_chain.subject: Cargo Quote Request - Singapore to China
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Quote Request - Singapore to China
email_chain.body:

Thank you for your message about the cargo shipment. We can arrange pickup from Singapore to China at a competitive rate. Our voyage schedule is flexible, so timing won't be an issue. If the cargo is in South Singapore, we can prepare the vessel to sail on short notice. Please advise your preferred ports of loading and discharge in both countries.

James Bae

email_chain.subject: Advice from shipmates
email_chain.body:

Best regards,
Roberto

email_chain.subject: Re: Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thank you for your email.

We can accommodate the cargo at Santos. My vessel is a 2002-built tanker with capacity for 7,000MT. I have just received loading permission at Santos port. Given our current position, Santos would be the optimal choice for us.

Best regards,
Francisco

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Advice
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thank you for your email.

I understand you have a 7,000MT cargo inquiry for Santos. After reviewing Francisco's advice and considering the distance to Santos from our current position, I agree that Santos would be the preferable option.

Best regards,
Pedro

email_chain.subject: Soybean Oil Shipment Quote Request
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Shipment Quote Request
email_chain.body:

Let me know if this is OK with you.

Best regards,
Erik

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Shipment Quote Request
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Shipment Quote Request
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Shipment Quote Request

email_chain.subject: Steel Cargo Inquiry - Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Morning Mr. Jones,

Could you confirm whether your vessel can carry 6,500MT of steel from Tokyo to Cleveland? Also, I notice you've been quoted a $2,500 pilotage fee from Tsukaji to Tokyo. I notice this is below the usual charge of $2,750 but can I get a breakdown of the charges for Tsukaji so I can be sure?

Thanks,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Cargo Inquiry - Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Dear Susan,

Thanks for your message. Unfortunately, I cannot carry 6,500MT. 

Regarding the ports, there's a bit more complexity to consider. While the quota in Japan is just over 15,000MT, and while Osaka is a major port, both Hiroshima and Kobe in the Kansai area are larger. For our cargo to be loaded, it would need to be routed through Osaka, which would incur additional costs. Therefore, the quote provided was contingent on Osaka being the port of discharge.

Regarding the pilotage fee issue, I can only confirm that the fee has been quoted from Tsukaji as this is the port of call on the vessel's itinerary.

Best regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Cargo Inquiry - Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Dear Ian,

As indicated before, the vessel cannot carry 6,500MT. Could I please request a breakdown of the pilotage fees so I can fully understand the costs? I have contacted the port of Osaka regarding the ultimate port of discharge. Due to the current port congestion there, they cannot determine when a berth will be available. I will ask them to confirm with the relevant operator and advise you immediately.

Kind regards,
Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Cargo Inquiry - Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Morning Susan,

Could you please let me know what you have found out regarding your vessel's port of discharge and port congestion in Osaka. I'm just waiting to hear back from the operators, but it seems they've all been over-loaded with cargo so far this year. I would appreciate your comments ASAP.

Also, please could you provide me with a breakdown of pilotage fees.

Thanks,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Vessel Booking Query - Dar es Salaam to Addis
email_chain.body:

We're loading 7,000MT of vegetables from Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa on Monday. Would it be possible to book 500MT of steel mill from Hamburg to Yokohama to release the vessel? How's your destination demurrage?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Query - Dar es Salaam to Addis
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thanks for your message. I'll check on the destination demurrage. The Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade is highly competitive right now, with service owners wanting to keep their vessels busy. My principal still does not have any available steel mill.

Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Query - Dar es Salaam to Addis
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I just received word from Hamburg. We will be able to charter a steel mill on the Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade for this Monday. I see one departure from Hamburg and one from Malaga with a possible unloading location in Mombasa. We will reserve one vessel for this delivery.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Query - Dar es Salaam to Addis
email_chain.body:

Cheers,

email_chain.subject: Quote Request - Petrochemicals Transport Antwerp
email_chain.body:

Best,
Justin

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request - Petrochemicals Transport Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,

Our standard freight rate of EUR 145 is for a standard 10m3 container from Noyers to Antwerp. For this shipment, with a volume of 100 m3, the applicable freight rate would be EUR 17,500.

Please inform me if you require any further information.

Best regards,
Zane

email_chain.subject: Charter inquiry - Rotterdam to Venice 4,200MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Any chance you can do a charter of 4,200MT of shale to Venice from Rotterdam next Thursday?

Regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter inquiry - Rotterdam to Venice 4,200MT
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Did I hear you say that you can now spare the M/V Lucie? The Venice shipment is 4,200MT, and would we have the Jane available on either Tuesday or Thursday of next week for an estimated load of oil?

Thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter inquiry - Rotterdam to Venice 4,200MT
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

The Lucie is a diesel ship so she has an operational capacity of around 5,000MT and I'm having trouble believing that 4,200MT of diesel could be raised for your ship. Given that the M/V Phyllis only loads 4,000MT of diesel and that the Phoenix is an even bigger ship, it just doesn't sound like we'll get the quantity that you require.

Many thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter inquiry - Rotterdam to Venice 4,200MT
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Please don't misunderstand, I understand the supply chain. I'm trying to help my customer find a shipping vessel. What I'm not saying is that you can't get the 4,200MT of diesel that the buyer requires, I'm just saying that we need to find the right vessel for this cargo.

Best regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Methanol Shipment Inquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi,

Can I have an open slot to ship 8,400MT of methanol from India to Chile? We can come on at noon Sunday, with a laycan by Friday. If that sounds good, could you confirm my details and send a proforma invoice?

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Inquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thanks for the enquiry. We can carry your cargo with a 7 day laycan from India to Chile.

We will send a proforma invoice for 1 MT as a sample. If this sounds ok, please reply with your bank details and I will send the proforma.

Thanks,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Inquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Our bank is IndusInd Bank Mumbai.

Please send the proforma with the relevant info.

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Inquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Sorry, IndusInd does not transfer dollars to India. Your FOB price of $350 is for rupees at INR 72, not dollars. Our 8,400 MT requirement would be $3.2 million at current rates.

We can ship 300 MT every two weeks for five months.

I'll convert these prices to rupees and send a proforma invoice.

Best,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Inquiry - India to Chile - Proforma Invoice
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Please see the attached proforma invoice for 300 MT of methanol at INR 71,249 per MT. We will ship your first load of methanol on 14 November 2018.

Your next three loads will be due 28 November, 12 December, and 26 December 2018.

Your total requirement will be 8,400 MT, which is worth $3.2 million at our current rates.

I have enclosed a copy of your credit application form, which I will process to send you a formal letter of credit (LC).

Please sign and return this form, and I will attach it to your LC for immediate processing.

Best,
Rahul

email_chain.body:

Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Test Equipment Requirements Review
email_chain.body:
Dear Rob,

I've checked with our team at VIRES, INC. regarding your inquiry. The SF-15 photo tester requires a software license that costs between $18,000 to $20,000 USD. This license is mandatory for operating the photo tester.

I recommend checking with our licensing department about potential lease agreements for the photo tester. Also, we need your confirmation on the final Pico Interlink requirements and whether you'll need any additional accessories for the SF-15 Photo tester.

While we can provide all equipment currently in our inventory, you're welcome to supply your own equipment if preferred. In that case, we won't need to handle billing and logistics.

Please let us know how you'd like to proceed.

Best regards,
Sarah

NZ Grains Export

James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Steel Coil Supply Inquiry - China to Spain
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Smith,

I am a Senior Purchaser with Superkoala Steel, and we need a supplier that can supply steel coils from China to Spain in bulk. Does your company have the capability to service this requirement, and what would you quote for the same?

Cheers,
Aaron

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Supply Inquiry - China to Spain
email_chain.body:
Dear Aaron,

Thank you very much for your interest. I must clarify that we are an Indian manufacturer, not Chinese. Our company has extensive experience exporting to European countries and is registered under the Indian Company Act.

We operate a modern state-of-the-art facility with:
- 100-tonne capacity meltshop
- Quality control laboratory
- High efficiency submerged arc furnace with automatic control
- Hot rolling plant
- Cold rolling and coil/coke drive services

Our annual production capacity is 3,000 tonnes of Hot Rolled Coils for the International Market, with current availability of 1,000 tonnes. We supply only 100% Made in India products of superior quality. We can also supply Iron Ore and Scrap materials.

Best regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Supply Inquiry - China to Spain
email_chain.body: I look forward to hearing back from you very soon.

email_chain.body:
Hello there!

This is an example of our automated email campaign feature. As you can see, we've set up two template emails:

Email 1 is the initial party invitation, and Email 2 is the follow-up reminder sent 24 hours later:
'We are glad to inform you that the Annual Christmas Party has already secured speakers from various niches to keep you entertained. We are sure you'll have a wonderful time. We hope to see you there!'

When informed that project assignments had already been distributed during the morning team meeting, she became argumentative and made several inappropriate comments about her superior capabilities.

When given the option to take the rest of the day off to reconsider her approach, she continued to be confrontational. Though she eventually left the office, I believe this warrants immediate attention.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.body:

I'll address the intern situation first thing tomorrow morning.

Best regards,

email_chain.body:

Kind regards,
Koji Furukawa
SKM/Methanol Division
JX Nippon Oil & Energy Corp.
JX Japan Methanol Co. Ltd.

Fax: +81-25-225-0612

Koji

Adam

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol and Naphtha Order Inquiry
email_chain.body:

Today is 4/5, and I will be back on Monday the 7th. We have had many people reach out to us in recent weeks who are purchasing methanol in other areas, and we need to be very careful to process their requests promptly.

My time is very limited because of the massive volume of requests. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Best regards,
Koji

https://www.schec-cma-cgm.com/schec/node/en/lagos

Aditya Ghosh

email_chain.subject: Road Salt Shipment Query - Storage and Insurance
email_chain.body:
Dear Dr. Benson,

I'm hoping to ship 20,000MT of road salt from Narita Airport to Buffalo. Do you charge a holding fee for 'storing' the cargo before it's picked up? How much does your insurance policy cost per container and per mile, and what would be the premium on 1,200 MT of salt?

Thanks,
Lloyd

email_chain.subject: Re: Road Salt Shipment Query - Storage and Insurance
email_chain.body:
Dear Lloyd,

Your email was received on my cell phone at 6:00pm today. I attempted to call you upon returning home. Unfortunately, while I had your phone number, I notice our email systems aren't properly synchronized for contact information sharing. This creates unnecessary communication delays.

Perhaps we should discuss implementing a better system for sharing contact details between our organizations?

Sincerely,
Dr. Benson

email_chain.subject: Re: Road Salt Shipment Query - Storage and Insurance
email_chain.body:
Dr. Benson,

I sent my initial inquiry yesterday morning at 7:30am and attempted to reach you by phone at 11:00am and again at 3:30pm, leaving messages both times. I'm quite concerned about the lack of response to my urgent query regarding the salt shipment.

The delayed response time and communication issues are seriously impacting our ability to proceed with this transaction. Could you please address the specific questions from my original email regarding storage fees and insurance costs?

Regards,
Lloyd

email_chain.subject: Advice on Chinese Commodity Imports

email_chain.subject: Re: Advice on Chinese Commodity Imports
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Michael,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm pleased to assist with your inquiry about Chinese imports. I believe visiting China would give you valuable insight into our complex trade environment and business practices. I would be happy to support your visit and share my experience.

I'm attaching a list of our current trading partners for your reference. Please feel free to contact me for more specific information about pricing, logistics, and regulatory requirements.

Best regards,
James Galloway

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request - LA to Singapore Oil Cargo
email_chain.body:
I'm reaching out regarding your request for a quote on an oil cargo loading from Los Angeles to Singapore. We understand the tight deadlines we're facing, so we want to get this quote to you as quickly as possible.

We're 48 hours out from providing our best offer, but it's very tight given the specifications. The key factor will be vessel availability at Los Angeles. We're currently looking at the container ship M/V Santa Rosalia, but its ETA to Los Angeles is still TBD.

Once we have a firm ETA for the vessel, we can proceed with detailed quotation. I'll update you as soon as we have this information.

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request - LA to Singapore Oil Cargo
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your response regarding the bulk oil cargo shipment from Los Angeles to Singapore. I must emphasize that we are working with an extremely tight timeframe. We need to deliver to our end customers by mid-June, but we only received the order last Friday.

Can you confirm if the M/V Santa Rosalia is still available? I understand the vessel is currently in Shanghai, but we need certainty about its availability and ETA in Los Angeles.

Please advise as soon as possible regarding the vessel's confirmed ETA.

email_chain.subject: RE: Quote Request - LA to Singapore Oil Cargo
email_chain.body:
Here is the contract price you requested for your bulk oil cargo shipment. While we continue monitoring the freight market for better options, this is currently our best available offer. There has been significant market activity in the last few days, and we expect more competitive offers may become available.

We understand this might not be the optimal offer you were hoping for, but given the time constraints, we wanted to present you with this currently available option. We will immediately notify you if any better offers come in.

Thank you for your patience and understanding in this matter.

Adi

email_chain.subject: Soft Drum Rates Question
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Lewis,

I was looking at the latest tables on your website, and noticed that you have suddenly dropped the soft Drum Rates. Could you share your rationale for the change?

Best,
Geoffrey

email_chain.subject: RE: Soft Drum Rates Question
email_chain.body:
Hi Geoffrey,

My soft (best match) rate went to -50% because, in looking for the soft (best match) rates, I found that there are NO soft (best match) rates currently available. Please refer to the explanation of soft (best match) rates in the Band Memberships Section for more details.

If you wish to have the current personal rate of -50%, please email me for your personal ID number, and I will apply it to your account. For the New Rates, you can add your personal rate as a donation to support the program.

Best regards,
Howard F. Lewis
